desc.en:
Experience the epitome of luxury living in this brand new Spanish frontline villa, where modern elegance meets breathtaking natural beauty. This stunning property boasts five spacious bedrooms and six opulent bathrooms, ensuring ample space and privacy for family and guests. The centerpiece of this exquisite home is the infinity pool, seamlessly blending with the horizon and offering mesmerizing sea views that transform your evenings into a tranquil retreat. Enjoy the convenience of a state-of-the-art gym, perfect for maintaining your fitness routine while soaking in the stunning surroundings. With a private lift for easy access to all levels, this villa is designed for both comfort and sophistication. Relax in the stylish lounge chairs by the pool, where you can unwind under the stars, making every moment a memorable experience. Indulge in the ultimate coastal lifestyle and make this luxurious villa your new sanctuary.
** COMPLETION SUMMER 2026 **

This beautifully presented 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom semi-detached San Jose property sits on a generous 158 m² plot, offering the perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and Mediterranean lifestyle.
The home features bright, well-proportioned interiors with a seamless flow between indoor and outdoor living. Both bedrooms are spacious, with two modern bathrooms designed for convenience and relaxation. Step outside to enjoy multiple outdoor spaces, ideal for dining, entertaining, or simply soaking up the Spanish sun.
A standout feature is the private solarium, providing an elevated retreat with ample space for sun loungers, chill-out seating, or even a summer kitchen—perfect for enjoying all-day sunshine and warm evenings.
Residents benefit from access to a beautifully maintained communal swimming pool, while the quiet, private street enhances the sense of exclusivity and tranquility.
Ideally located, the property is just a 10-minute walk to the famous Cabo Roig Strip, renowned for its vibrant selection of restaurants, bars, and nightlife, as well as close proximity to stunning beaches, amenities, and transport links.
Whether as a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment opportunity, this property offers exceptional value in one of the Costa Blanca’s most sought-after locations.

Fantastic opportunity to purchase a Penthouse apartment with a tourist license, in a prestigious location, just 500 m from the sea. This fully reformed property is located on the corner of the 6th floor boasting panoramic views towards the Mediterranean sea, the salt lakes, the mountains where you can enjoy super pretty sunrises and sunsets and open night views across the neighbourhood. The apartment has two bright and spacious bedrooms along with a brand new bathroom complete with walk-in shower. There is also a large living and dining room and a well designed open plan kitchen with brand new appliances. The fantastic terrace is accessed via patio doors where you will really appreciate the spectacular sea views. The property has been finished with so many extras including sound-insulated windows, lift access, Inverter air conditioning with WiFi control, QLED smart television, designer furniture, Security system, dishwasher, washing machine, Programmable boiler, concealed ambient LED lighting, large-format porcelain tiles, Induction hob plus more. The apartment already has a tourist license, meaning a new license can be reissued to the new owner (licenses are granted in this building). The penthouse forms part of a well maintained complex where home owners and enjoy use of the swimming pool and renovation of the external building is currently in progress. There is communal parking within the complex and optional underground parking available for 10,000.00 euros. Sold as seen, fully equipped and ready to go.

Discover relaxed Mediterranean living in this charming ground-floor apartment located in the heart of San Pedro del Pinatar. Featuring 2 comfortable bedrooms and 1 modern bathroom, this inviting home is ideal as a holiday retreat, rental investment, or year-round residence.
The highlight of the property is the very sunny private outdoor terrace, perfect for morning coffees, al fresco dining, or soaking up the Spanish sunshine all year round. Inside, the apartment offers a practical and welcoming layout with plenty of natural light and easy access throughout.
Set in a quiet yet convenient area, the apartment is just a pleasant 10-minute walk to the beach, allowing you to enjoy the Mar Menor coastline, promenades, and beachfront cafés whenever you wish. Shops, restaurants, and local amenities are also close by, making everyday living effortless.
A wonderful opportunity to own a low-maintenance, beachside home in one of the Costa Cálida’s most sought-after locations.

Located on a large plot in the sought-after area of El Chaparral, this 140 m² villa presents a fantastic opportunity to renovate, extend, or redevelop in one of Torrevieja’s most attractive and well-connected neighbourhoods.
The existing property offers 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom and requires renovation, making it an ideal blank canvas for buyers looking to create a bespoke family home or a high-potential investment. The generous plot size provides excellent flexibility and future possibilities.
There is potential to build two separate dwellings, each measuring 140 m², making this an especially attractive option for developers, investors, or those seeking a dual-living or rental income opportunity.
Set in a beautiful, established residential area, the villa is within walking distance of bars, restaurants, shops, and the famous El Chaparral skate park, offering a perfect blend of lifestyle, convenience, and long-term value.
Key features:
140 m² villa
3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom
Large plot
Renovation project with excellent potential
Possibility to create two separate 140 m² homes
Walking distance to amenities and skate park
Prime El Chaparral location, Torrevieja
This is a rare opportunity to secure a substantial plot with significant development potential in a desirable Costa Blanca location.

This impressive ground-floor apartment offers bright, contemporary living with a stylish open-plan layout. Large double patio doors open onto a private garden with an electric awning, providing direct access to the immaculately kept communal gardens and swimming pool, which also includes a separate children’s pool. Both spacious double bedrooms have direct access to the garden, while the principal bedroom benefits from its own en-suite bathroom. The apartment features built-in wardrobes in both bedrooms and ducted air conditioning throughout, providing both cooling and heating for year-round comfort. Additional benefits include a private underground parking space, a secure storage room, and an active tourist licence.
Located within the sought-after Soleil complex, the property is within easy walking distance of local amenities and Villamartín Plaza. A short drive takes you to the popular La Zenia Boulevard shopping centre, renowned golf courses, and the stunning beaches and marinas of Orihuela Costa. The area also offers a wide range of leisure activities, including cinemas, restaurants, shopping, sports facilities, water parks, bowling, karting, diving, and much more.

Discover an exceptional villa that blends contemporary elegance with relaxed Mediterranean charm in the highly sought-after area of Los Balcones, Torrevieja. Set on a private plot, this stunning 5-bedroom, 4-bathroom residence is offered fully furnished, allowing you to move in and start enjoying the lifestyle immediately.
The villa welcomes you with generous, sun-filled interiors, high-quality finishes, and a seamless flow throughout. Stylish furnishings complement the modern design, while each bedroom offers comfort and privacy. The beautifully appointed bathrooms reflect refined taste and attention to detail. The heart of the home opens onto a private swimming pool, creating the perfect setting for entertaining, family gatherings, or tranquil afternoons under the Spanish sun.
Outside, the landscaped terraces provide multiple areas to relax and dine al fresco, and the private garage ensures convenience and security. Every detail of this home has been carefully considered to deliver both elegance and functionality.
Located just minutes from beaches, golf courses, shops, and restaurants, this villa offers the ideal balance of exclusivity and accessibility—perfect as a permanent residence, luxury holiday home, or high-end investment.
Key Features:
Fully furnished
5 spacious bedrooms & 4 modern bathrooms
Private swimming pool
Private garage
Elegant, light-filled interiors
Prime location in Los Balcones, Torrevieja
A truly gorgeous villa that captures the essence of luxury living on the Costa Blanca.

Once in a lifetime opportunity to purchase an incredible villa on a huge 11,000m2 plot with breath-taking views over Embalase de la Pedrera reservoir in Torremendo. This huge elevated plot is easily accessed from the main road with a private road leading up towards the main villa and fully landscaped garden with private swimming pool, double garage, the horse stables and vast paddock area. The villa has been built to very high specification with many special features and extras including solar panels, heated swimming pool with electric roof, double garage and separate storage room, oil central heating, air-conditioning, log burner, hidden utility room, plus a lot more. The villa has a very thoughtful layout that flows with high ceilings and floor to ceiling windows that make the absolute most of the spectacular views across the lake, lemon groves and reservoir. On the ground floor of the property there are three double bedrooms, a family bathroom with shower and bathtub, the fantastic L-shaped living and dining room which leads into the fully equipped bespoke kitchen. To the rear of the kitchen is a covered terrace and storage area which wraps around to the swimming pool. This area has direct views across Torremendo and the reservoir and no expense has been sparred with the installation of the heated pool and electric roof to make this space useable all year round. The impressive master bedroom is accessed from a private staircase in the living room where you will find the bespoke en-suite bathroom with walk in shower, bathroom and luxurious vanity unit. The master bedroom also has a walk in dressing room along with a private terrace overlooking the vast plot towards the Embalse de la Pedrera reservoir, Vega Baja mountain range and the pretty lemon groves. Outside, the garden has been beautifully landscaped with ornamental stones, Mediterranean trees and plants and is maintained to an immaculate standard. The main plot is accessed via electric gates where there is also the purpose built double garage along with a large storage room and boiler room. The property also boasts an equestrian area with four beautiful stables, the tack room, and paddock area which leads down to another plot with a small summer house. The potential to develop this space into a business is huge. This property is sold furnished and really must be seen to be truly appreciated.

Beautiful Ground Floor Apartment – 2 Bed, 2 Bath – Lo Pagán (San Pedro del Pinatar) Welcome to your dream home in the sought-after coastal area of Lo Pagán / San Pedro del Pinatar, just a short stroll from the world-famous mud baths and thermal spas. This superb ground floor apartment combines comfort, convenience, and unbeatable location — perfect as a holiday retreat, permanent residence, or investment rental.
Property Features
2 Bedrooms: Bright and airy rooms with plenty of natural light for comfortable living.
2 Bathrooms: Including a master en-suite, both modern and fully fitted.
Spacious Living Area: Open plan lounge/dining area ideal for relaxing or entertaining.
Fitted Kitchen: Practical and well-equipped kitchen with good storage and workspace.
Ground Floor Access: Step straight out to the communal areas — no stairs needed!
Terrace / Patio: Private outdoor space perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation.
Large Communal Pool: Enjoy sun-soaked days by the pool in a tranquil setting.
Well-Maintained Gardens: Attractive green areas around the property.
Parking: Resident parking available.

Enjoy breath-taking views, an unbeatable location next to the municipal swimming pool, and everything you need within easy reach.
This bright and generously sized studio apartment has been fully renovated making it an excellent choice as a holiday retreat, a smart investment, or a comfortable home for all-year living.
The property is ready to move in or rent out immediately.
Highlights include:
Spacious studio with a modern, recently renovated interior
Private balcony offering stunning panoramic views over the entire Vega Baja area
Peaceful yet well-connected neighbourhood
Municipal swimming pool just steps away
Bars and local amenities within walking distance
Only a short drive from La Marquesa Golf Course
Ideal for sun lovers, golf enthusiasts, and anyone looking for a calm setting on the Costa Blanca. A fantastic opportunity not to be missed!

This contemporary semi-detached villa, completed in 2024, is offered for sale as an exceptional resale property, combining generous proportions, comfort, and a range of high-quality enhancements.
Created to suit modern lifestyles, the property offers four bedrooms and three bathrooms, making it well suited for families or buyers who value extra space for visitors. The villa stands out immediately due to the quality of its finishes and the careful upgrades made throughout the home.
A standout feature is the expansive basement, which provides flexible space that can be adapted to suit a variety of needs, such as a second living area, storage, a gym, a home cinema, or guest accommodation. At ground level, multiple terraces invite outdoor living and offer ideal areas to relax and enjoy the surroundings.
The exterior includes a private swimming pool measuring 4 x 8 metres, noticeably larger than many in the area, allowing for comfortable swimming and leisure. The outdoor spaces are finished with upgraded tiling that enhances comfort and creates a more refined and welcoming atmosphere.
Energy efficiency has also been considered, with the installation of 12 solar panels to help reduce running costs and support a more sustainable way of living.
This near-new villa brings together contemporary architecture, quality finishes, and versatile living spaces. An excellent opportunity to acquire a modern home with premium features already in place.

FRONTLINE, STUNNING SEA VIEWS! We are proud to present a beautiful, renovated frontline apartment located in Mil Palmeras, renowned as one of the finest beaches on the coast. The apartment is located on the second-floor, features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a bright, open living/dining area, and a fully fitted kitchen. The livingroom area opens onto a large terrace, offering beautiful views of the sea. The property comes fully furnished and includes air conditioning and elevator access. It is located within a secure, enclosed community to ensure privacy. Included with the property are two private parking spaces, one in the community garage and one in the outdoor parking area. And it also has a valid tourist rental license. This property is a must see and are hard to find in the area. The area offers a vibrant strip for dining, a lot of restaurants ,bars, beach bars, shops and more. Mil Palmeras is known for its beautiful beaches, clear waters and is considered one of the best in the Orihuela costa coastline.

✨ Ultra-Luxury Contemporary Villa | Torreta Florida, Torrevieja
An exceptional detached villa in the prestigious and highly sought-after area of Torreta Florida, perfectly positioned near the famous pink salt lakes and just a short drive from Torrevieja’s finest sandy beaches.
Built in 2024 on an impressive 850 m² private plot, this striking contemporary home offers 250 m² of beautifully designed living space, combining architectural elegance with cutting-edge technology and premium finishes throughout.
*Interior Highlights
Set across two levels, the villa features soaring high ceilings and expansive windows, flooding the home with natural light and creating a remarkable sense of space and openness.
5 spacious bedrooms, designed for comfort and privacy
4 bathrooms in total, including luxury bathrooms with self-cleaning whirlpool tubs
Two generous living rooms, offering flexible entertaining and relaxation spaces
Dedicated office, ideal for remote working or a private study
The villa stands out for its clean architectural lines, refined materials, and meticulous attention to detail, delivering a perfect balance of contemporary style and everyday comfort.
*Designer Kitchen & Finishes
The heart of the home is the bespoke Schmidt kitchen, valued at €25,000, featuring:
High-end integrated appliances
Induction hob with integrated extractor
Premium ceramic finishes
Matte black aluminium carpentry throughout the property
Every element has been carefully selected to enhance both aesthetics and functionality.
*Smart Home Technology
This villa is fully equipped for modern living, including: Intelligent lighting system controlled via mobile app, Ethernet connections in all rooms, dining area, and kitchen, LG washer & dryer with WiFi connectivity, Centralised air conditioning and Hot water system via electric heater
*Outdoor Living – A Private Mediterranean Retreat
The exterior is nothing short of spectacular, designed to enjoy the Costa Blanca lifestyle year-round: Saltwater swimming pool with waterfall feature, Private mini football/soccer pitch, Sunken conversation pit, perfect for evening gatherings, Multiple outdoor dining and lounge areas, Fully equipped barbecue area, Manicured gardens and sunny terraces.
This outdoor space offers complete privacy and is ideal for entertaining, relaxing, and enjoying long Mediterranean days with family and friends.
🌞 A Rare Opportunity - This turn-key luxury villa is a rare find in Torreta Florida — ideal as a permanent residence, luxury holiday home, or high-end investment property.
Early viewing is highly recommended to truly appreciate the quality, space, and lifestyle this exceptional villa offers.

This exclusive villa stands out for its 3 bright bedrooms, 3 en-suite bathrooms and spacious terraces with private swimming pool, creating a perfect space to relax and enjoy the warm Mediterranean climate.
Its modern architecture and open-plan interiors maximise natural light and offer an experience of comfort and well-being in every corner.
Located in a privileged natural environment, the property guarantees maximum privacy, making it an ideal refuge for those seeking tranquillity and quality of life. The outdoor spaces, designed to coexist with nature, allow you to disconnect and enjoy a serene atmosphere all year round.
A home that fuses contemporary design, comfort and privacy, created to live the authentic Mediterranean lifestyle in a unique setting.

The villa is centrally located with a 10-minute walk to Spain's largest outdoor shopping centre, restaurants and grocery stores. 20 minute walk to the beach. The nearest restaurants are a few meters away.
The house has a large outdoor area on the ground floor with sunbeds, sofa groups, dining area and lounge. Perfect property for people who want that little something extra. There is an outdoor kitchen with a sink, grill and space for a large dining table, which is often a meeting point for late evenings with good food. There is also a patch of garden which is perfect for the little ones as a playground. (artificial grass)
On the main floor you will find a spacious living room, as well as a kitchen with integrated appliances from Bosch. There is also 1 bedroom with access to the garden area, as well as a bathroom. On the 2nd floor there are 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There is also access to terraces, as well as stairs up to the roof terrace with its own shower. The roof terrace has a great sea view and has the sun until it sets in late summer evenings.
The lower floor has a basement living room, bedroom and bathroom. Here there is also the opportunity to sit down for a bit in peace and quiet if you want to work a bit during the holiday. There is also a washing machine installed in the bathroom.
There are a total of 4 bedrooms with space for double beds and associated bathrooms. There is also a room in the basement today that can be used as a bedroom. This is used as a warehouse/storage as of today.
The kitchen is modern with integrated, high-quality appliances.

An amazing opportunity to buy this fantastic fully registered stables with RIGA license for 5 horses along with the beautiful unregistered Converted barn and storage block. This unique plot of land is located just a few minutes walk from Algorfa village and on the edge of Almoradi. It backs onto the river Segura, perfect for hacks and pretty walks. The plot has full 'off grid solar system', fresh water from the well, Star link internet with amazing signal and speed, gas water heaters, a brand new back up generator and with a fully alarmed cámara system throughout the plot which also has an irrigation system. The stables have automatic horse water feeds plus a brand new tack room and horse shower. The barn has been thoughtfully converted to include a master bedroom complete with a stunning en-suite bathroom along with a second bedroom and guest bathroom. This plot also boasts an additional 30m2 storage block, complete with two toilets. This is unique opportunity and viewing is recommended in order to be appreciated.

This brand new, modern apartment is located in the highly sought-after Flamenca Village and features a south-west facing balcony overlooking the beautifully maintained pool area.
The exclusive urbanisation offers outstanding communal facilities, including four swimming pools (one of them heated), a fully equipped gym, landscaped promenade areas, and a pool bar, creating a resort-style living environment.
The apartment is fully equipped and ready to move into, sold furnished and including appliances and air conditioning throughout.
Upon entering the property, you are welcomed into a hallway leading directly to a bright and spacious open-plan living area with lounge, dining space, and modern kitchen. Large sliding doors open onto the generous 19 m² balcony, perfect for outdoor dining and relaxation.
From the living area, a passage leads to the two bedrooms, a family bathroom, and a large storage room. The master bedroom benefits from an en-suite bathroom and also has sliding doors with direct access to the balcony.
This is a turnkey property, ideal as a permanent residence, holiday home, or investment in one of the Costa Blanca’s most popular developments.

This charming renovated bungalow in Blue Lagoon offers a Mediterranean lifestyle in one of the quietest and most established areas of the Orihuela Costa. With 58 m² of living space, a private 48 m² solarium, and a generous 202 m² plot, it stands out for its exterior spaciousness and its 147 m² garden, perfect for enjoying the weather all year round.
The fully renovated home features 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with a shower and screen, wood-effect laminate flooring, and a brand-new kitchen equipped with all appliances. The solarium has been tastefully finished with artificial grass and a brezo enclosure, provides an ideal space to relax in complete privacy. In addition, the large plot allows the future owner to install a private pool if desired (at their own expense).
The location is unbeatable: just a few minutes from the El Limonar International School, several golf courses, the Villamartín shopping center, the Marimba Blue complex (with a pool, restaurant, and 3 paddle tennis courts), and the well-known Greenlands Blue Lagoon, with its spectacular mini-golf and thatched-roof restaurant.

Fantastic opportunity to purchase a bargain property located just 200m from La Mata beach. This duplex apartment forms part of a well established community within easy walking distance to the beach along with numerous restaurants, tapas bars and convenience stores all on your doorstep. The apartment is located just inside the gated community and boasts a private garden along with a private solarium. A staircase leads up to apartment and straight away you have clear sea views out towards the Mediterranean from the living and dining room. There is a American style open plan kitchen along with a double bedroom and the family bathroom. A staircase leads up the second guest bedroom which has private access to the solarium and more sea views. The property is sold as seen with brand new appliances in the kitchen, air-conditioning throughout and a storage room on the ground floor. Residencial 'El Balon de Torreblanca' is a well maintained community where home owners and residents can enjoy the pretty gardens and swimming pool.

Magnificent Estate in the Sierra de Columbares Natural Park, Gea y Truyols for sale. Nestled in the heart of nature, this property enjoys an idyllic setting with spectacular views of the valley and surrounding mountains.
The estate comprises 22,364 m2 of land, located just 25 km from the beach, 17 km from the center of Murcia, 25 km from the new Corvera Airport, and close to several golf courses. The property comprises 284 m2 of built area, including the main house, annex, tool shed, and swimming pool. Inside the finca boasts 3 bedrooms (with the possibility of a fourth in the annex) 2 bathrooms, Kitchen, Living and dining room. There are many extras including heating, air conditioning, solar-powered water system, five water shares, and reverse osmosis filtration.
Outdoor there is a fabulous 9x12m swimming pool, bar area, sauna, spa, and outdoor kitchen with barbecue.
The huge 22,364m2 plot is fully fenced with a private road monitored by security cameras.

Fantastic opportunity to purchase this well presented 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom ground floor apartment in the highly sought-after residential area of La Zenia. The property forms part of the well maintained complex 'Molino Blanco II' boasting communal gardens, gated swimming pool, and numerous sun-bathing areas.
This garden apartment boasts a huge tiled terrace with modern brand new tiling providing perfect space for sunbathing and outdoor dining. A few stairs lead up to the elevated glazed terrace which is used a second lounge area, perfect for the Winter sunshine. Inside there is a very bright, large living and dining room and fully equipped independent kitchen with access to the covered utility and storage room. There are two double bedrooms and a family bathroom with a walk-in shower. The apartment is ideally situated within very easy walking distance to a wide range of services and amenities and is just a short walk to Zenia Boulevard along with the wonderful sandy beaches of La Zenia and the Orihuela Costa. This apartment is sold fully furnished with air-conditioning and has been used as a very successful holiday rental with a license that could be transferred to a new investor.

Super modern 2nd floor apartment for sale on sought after Las Colinas Golf resort. This huge apartment has 2 very large bedrooms both with en-suite bathrooms along with a 3rd guest toilet. Their is a fully integrated and slick open-plan kitchen leading into the very wide living and dining room. There is a mega balcony with the most stunning sea views, golf course views and looks down over the manicured gardens and swimming pool. The property is sold as seen, with many extras including underground parking and storage and already has a rental license.

This fabulous home is located in a prime location in Cabo Roig, just 400m from the beach. This stunning villa has been beautifully refurbished throughout to a high standard with underfloor heating in all 4 bathrooms, air conditioning in all rooms and ceramo granite flooring throughout. Set on a 518m2 plot the property consists of:
OUTSIDE High walls around the boundaries, with new non slip floor tiles, 8×6 infinity pool, space for parking 3 cars off road, shower, brick built storage room, room to make outdoor entertaining area on a 518m2 plot.
LOUNGE 6.51 X 5.81 m2 Wood burn fire and marble fire surround fire place, windows to the side, door to the cloakroom with low flush toilet and sink. To the rear of the property there are patio doors that leads out onto the outdoor dining area.
KITCHEN 1.91 X 5.90 m2 Fully fitted in cream shaker style units with ceramic hob, electric oven, fridge freezer, dish washer and washer all made by Bosch. Granite work tops and splash backs, electric boiler, window to the side and door to the rear side leading to the garden. Possible to make a garden kitchen.
BEDROOM ONE 2.44 X 4.33 m2 Window to the side, air conditioning installed. This room could be used as office or dining room. Has all pre-installed internet and communication cables.
BATHROOM 3.65 X 1.77 m2 Under floor heating, shower cubicle, sink, low flush toilet, bidet and window to the side. Tiled tastefully throughout in cream.
BEDROOM TWO 3.36 X 3.67 m2 Patio window to the front leading to front balcony and air conditioning.
FIRST FLOOR BEDROOM THREE 3.24 X 3.92 m2 with ENSUITE 3.65 X 1.87 m2 Patio door leading onto private balcony, air conditioning and door to en-suite. En-suite with under floor heating, tiled throughout, walk in shower, low flush toilet, bidet and glass sink unit.
BEDROOM FOUR 3.74 X 3.58 m2 with ENSUITE 3.60 X 1.92 m2 Patio door to the rear leading onto rear balcony of 20m2, air conditioning and door to en suite. En suite with under floor heating, walk in shower, low flush toilet, bedit and double his and hers vanity sink unit.
BEDROOM FIVE 3.87 X 3.90 m2 with EN SUITE 3.55 X 1.92 m2 Patio window to the front leading to the front private balcony, air conditioning and door to ensuite. Ensuite with bath and overhead shower, low flush toilet, bidet, vanity sink unit, under floor heating and tiled throughout. There is a window to the rear. All fixtures and fittings are brand new, never used and to the highest quality.
2ND FLOOR SOLARIUM With stone balustrade, floor tiles and sea views. Sunny and private. The property should be view to see the quality and finish. To arrange appointment please call us today

Located only 200 metres from the stunning sandy beaches of San Pedro del Pinatar, this charming first-floor apartment in Lo Pagan offers the perfect combination of comfort, convenience, and coastal living — ideal for holidays, year-round living, or as a rental investment.
The property comprises 2 double bedrooms and 1 modern bathroom, a bright and spacious lounge-dining area, and a well-equipped kitchen with underfloor heating, water filtration system, and waste disposal unit.
Enjoy the Mediterranean sunshine on the south-east facing balcony, perfect for relaxing or dining outdoors.
Additional features include: ✅ Underfloor heating in the kitchen and bathroom ✅ Private parking space in the underground garage ✅ Communal solarium with beautiful views ✅ Shared plunge pool for cooling off on warm days
Situated in a peaceful area yet close to shops, restaurants, and the beach, this property offers an excellent opportunity to enjoy the very best of Costa Blanca living.

Spectacular Penthouse Apartment for sale with a private 95m2 solarium located in the brand new complex Residential Soul in the heart of Pau 8, Villamartin. The property has never been lived in and giving the opportunity to add your own personal style and furnishings. The spacious property comprises of a very impressive open plan living and dining area with feature high ceilings and large windows providing lots of natural light. There is a fully equipped slick kitchen, fantastic master bedroom with en-suite bathroom along with a second guest bedroom and guest bathroom. The property has many, many extras including pre-installation for air-conditioning and a outdoor kitchen on the solarium along with underground parking and a storage unit.
An exclusive home to enjoy year-round or a smart investment in a booming area ideal as a permanent residence, holiday home or high-yield investment.
Furniture that appears in the images is not real and is there for referance. Of how it could be layed out

This stunning and modern 5 bedroom, 4 bathrooms detached villa commands a fantastic position in the very popular area of La Zenia, just 100 metres from the beautiful blue flag beach. The area features a huge selection of amenities, including the very impressive Zenia Boulevard shopping centre, with over 150 shops and a selection of good restaurants. Recently built and completed in 2023, this very stylish villa offers spacious rooms throughout, with wonderful outdoor space to enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean climate. The ground floor comprises an entrance hallway, leading into to fabulous living room with a dining area and an open-plan fully fitted kitchen with an island. Large patio doors lead you to the terrace and pool area. This level also features a large double bedroom with ensuite bathroom, a double bedroom and a separate bathroom. An internal staircase leads you to the underbuild, featuring and a separate laundry room. Situated on the first floor is the sumptuous master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and ensuite, a second large double bedroom with ensuite, and a third guest double bedroom with ensuite. Each bedroom has direct access to the large wrap-around sun terrace. Internal stairs lead to the large roof terrace, perfect for relaxing day or night with views of the sea. The very attractive, low-maintenance garden benefits from the fabulous heated pool, a large terrace area, an outdoor kitchen with a seating area with a retractable awning, a storage room, and a private garage. Other features include Daikin brand air heater with fun-coil, with underfloor heating in all floors.

Discover this impressive 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom detached villa perfectly positioned in one of Benijofar’s most desirable areas. Offering both space and style, this property is ideal for large families or those who love to entertain.
Step outside to your own private oasis — featuring a large swimming pool, spacious front and rear gardens, and a beautiful terrace and balcony where you can enjoy the sunshine and stunning views.
Additional highlights include a large garage, ample storage, and generous indoor and outdoor living spaces that provide comfort and flexibility all year round.

Discover this beautifully stunning new build villa offering the perfect combination of space, comfort, and style in one of Villamartin’s most sought-after locations.
This charming home comes fully furnished and features a private pool, private parking, front and rear garden areas, a bright open-plan kitchen, air conditioning, solar system, electric shutters, 3 terraces and a stunning solarium — ideal for relaxing or entertaining under the Spanish sun.
Whether you’re looking for a permanent residence, a holiday retreat, or a smart investment, this villa ticks all the boxes.

This lovely ground-floor corner apartment, perfectly located in a quiet and maintained urbanisation in Lomas de Cabo Roig. Offering a great blend of comfort, convenience, and value, this property is ideal for families, a holiday home, or an investment opportunity.
The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a bright and spacious living area, and access to a communal pool — perfect for relaxing or enjoying time with family and friends. Additional benefits include off-road parking and close proximity to local amenities, restaurants, and beaches.
Don’t miss the chance to own this charming home in one of the Costa Blanca’s most sought-after areas!

Fantastic opportunity to buy a sunny, south facing bungalow in the heart of La Zenia, just minutes from Zenia Boulevard and just 1,500m to La Zenia Beach. This property has a spacious easy to maintain, tiled front garden with a purpose built shed and storage room. Inside, is a large living and dining room with the kitchen situated to the rear of the house leading onto a spacious utility and storage room with access to the external shed. There are also two large bedrooms along with the family bathroom located on the ground floor. Upstairs leads to the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom with french doors leading out to the sunny solarium and additional storage room currently used as a fourth bedroom. The property forms part of a sought after complex where home owners can enjoy the immaculate communal pool and communal gardens. Zenia Boulevard shopping mall is just a short 10 minute walk away as well as the Playa Flamenca Saturday market.

This beautifully renovated 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom penthouse apartment is perfectly positioned in the highly sought-after area of Playa Flamenca, within the desirable urbanization Zenia Star 1. Boasting a bright and open layout, the property offers a modern and stylish living space designed for comfort and convenience. The apartment enjoys a sunny south-facing orientation, allowing for plenty of natural light throughout the day, and features wonderful sea views that can be enjoyed from the main living area and terrace.
The home has been completely refurbished to a high standard, combining contemporary finishes with practical design. The open-plan kitchen and living area create a welcoming atmosphere, ideal for relaxing or entertaining guests. A separate utility room adds extra functionality, while a private storage room provides additional space for personal belongings.
