Esta preciosa villa se encuentra en una zona tranquila y privada de La Nucía, a solo cinco minutos en coche de Benidorm. Ofrece una combinación fantástica de amplitud, comodidad y un entorno espectacular.
Ubicada en una generosa parcela de 3.500 m², la vivienda cuenta con 600 m² construidos, ofreciendo un amplio espacio tanto interior como exterior para disfrutar del estilo de vida mediterráneo. La villa dispone de cuatro amplios dormitorios dobles, cada uno con su propio baño en suite, además de un baño adicional y un aseo para invitados. El salón, de 100 m², está lleno de luz natural y se conecta con una cocina y comedor de estilo abierto, perfecto tanto para el día a día como para recibir invitados.
Desde la terraza se pueden contemplar vistas panorámicas que se extienden desde las montañas hasta el mar. Se puede ver claramente Benidorm y Altea mientras se disfruta de la tranquilidad del entorno. El jardín, perfectamente cuidado, incluye una gran piscina privada, terrazas soleadas y mucho espacio abierto para relajarse o entretenerse.
En la parte trasera de la propiedad hay espacio suficiente para construir una pista privada de pádel o tenis, lo que aporta aún más valor y posibilidades de ocio a la vivienda.
Todo lo que necesitas está a poca distancia a pie: supermercados, el colegio británico Elian’s, bancos, farmacia, tiendas locales y una amplia oferta de bares y restaurantes. Atracciones principales como Terra Mítica, Terra Natura y varios campos de golf se encuentran a solo unos minutos en coche. También están muy cerca localidades como Altea, Albir, Polop y Alfaz del Pi.
Una villa tranquila y privada, con vistas impresionantes y el potencial de crear tu propio espacio deportivo y de ocio, en pleno corazón de la Costa Blanca.
desc.en:
This beautifully designed villa is located in a quiet and private part of La Nucía, just a five-minute drive from Benidorm. It offers a fantastic combination of space, comfort, and stunning surroundings.
Set on a generous 3,500 m² plot, the home boasts 600 m² of living space, with plenty of room both indoors and outdoors to enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle. The villa features four large double bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom, plus an additional bathroom and a separate WC for guests. The spacious 100 m² lounge is filled with natural light and connects to a bright, open-plan kitchen and dining area, ideal for both everyday living and entertaining.
Step out onto the terrace and take in the panoramic views stretching from the mountains to the sea. You can clearly see Benidorm and Altea while enjoying the peaceful surroundings. The beautifully maintained garden includes a large private swimming pool, sunny terraces, and plenty of open space to relax or entertain.
At the rear of the property, there is enough space to build a private padel or tennis court, adding even more lifestyle and leisure value to the home.
Everything you need is within walking distance, including supermarkets, Elian’s British School, banks, pharmacy, local shops, and a wide range of restaurants and bars. Major attractions like Terra Mítica, Terra Natura, and several golf courses are just a couple of minutes away by car. Nearby towns such as Altea, Albir, Polop, and Alfaz del Pi are also close by. A peaceful and private villa with breathtaking views and the potential to create your own personal sports and leisure space—right in the heart of the Costa Blanca.

A true jewel of the Mediterranean, just listed and already turning heads in the luxury property world. The newly available beachfront villa, located in the prestigious enclave of Cabo Roig, Costa Blanca South, is not only front line to the shimmering sea — it was personally designed and built by a well known property tycoon as his private Spanish retreat.
Touted as the most exclusive villa in the region, the property offers a rare combination of architectural brilliance, breathtaking panoramic views, and unparalleled privacy. With direct access to the beach and set against the backdrop of the Mediterranean coastline, this estate stands as a testament to Maher’s vision of opulence and serenity.
The villa features expansive living spaces, state-of-the-art amenities, and luxurious finishes throughout. Floor-to-ceiling glass windows invite natural light and open up uninterrupted sea views, while the outdoor living areas — including an infinity pool, landscaped gardens, and multiple terraces — are crafted for both relaxation and sophisticated entertaining.
“This is not just a property — it’s a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own a piece of Cabo Roig history” where no expense has been spared in creating a sanctuary that embodies both modern luxury and Mediterranean charm.”
The villa has been finished with a super luxurious eye to detail with life access and an independent guest annex.

This stunning country home, built in 2020, is set on a generous 2,000m² plot just a stone’s throw from the lovely town of Alcantarilla. With 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, including a master bedroom with its own private en-suite, this property offers the perfect blend of comfort, space, and style. Inside, you'll find a cozy fireplace, air conditioning for year-round comfort, and a fully filtered water system throughout the home. The open and inviting layout is filled with natural light, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
Outside, the property boasts a newly built 10x4 swimming pool complete with a pool heater, allowing you to enjoy a swim all year round. The large driveway fits up to 8 cars, and there’s a fantastic chillout area perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The fully fitted outdoor kitchen with BBQ and oven makes al fresco dining a real pleasure. External stairs lead to a spacious solarium with breathtaking mountain views, offering potential to convert into additional living space or simply to soak in the tranquil surroundings.
For added peace of mind, the house is equipped with full security cameras around the property, ensuring you feel safe and secure at all times.
Located within walking distance to the popular Restaurante "El Pedrusco", known for its traditional Murcian dishes, and only a short drive into Alcantarilla town, where you’ll find everything you need from shops, bars, restaurants, and schools to hospitals and other essential services. And if you're dreaming of the coast, the beautiful beaches of the Mar Menor are just a 20-minute drive away, making this property a perfect blend of peaceful country living with excellent access to town and sea.
Whether you’re looking for a full-time residence, a holiday home, or a fantastic investment, this countryside gem truly ticks all the boxes.

Rare opportunity to purchase this spectacular property in Calas de Campoamor with open sea views, just 100m from the beach. This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom villa boasts a heated saline swimming pool installed less than 2 years ago along with a private solarium and underground garage and storage room. Located in a gated complex this property has been maintained to a very high standard with a sleek brand new kitchen and very attractive marble flooring throughout. On the ground floor there is fantastic living and dining room with floor to ceiling patio doors leading outside the the tiled terrace and swimming pool which has been finished with artificial grass. On the first floor you with find the master bedroom that enjoys sea views and en-suite bathroom along with two double guest bedrooms and the family bathroom all with views towards the sea or the communal swimming pool. On the top floor you will find the fabulous solarium with more stunning views of the Mediterranean and down towards the Mar Menor. The villa has an underground garage and storage accessed via an internal staircase, where you can conveniently access your car and exit the complex via electric doors. The house forms part of a well maintained complex where home owners also have use of the huge communal swimming pool and pretty garden. The property is sold as seen, fully furnished with many, many extras including independent laundry room, new air-conditioning units in the bedrooms, brand new kitchen appliances, non-chemical saline heated pool system, automated garage doors, intercom entry system, open fireplace in the living room and purpose built barbecue on the main terrace. Calas de Campoamor is a sought after location with all amenities within a few minutes walking distance including an international supermarket and bakery, 24hr pharmacy and medical centre along with a vast array of restaurants, cocktail and tapas bars.

Immaculate villa for sale located with elevated, front-line views located at Las Ramblas golf resort. This impressive south facing property was designed so that every room boasts spectacular views across the golf course and pine forrest. On the main level of the property is a huge living room with seperate television and dining areas along with a guest toilet. There is an impressive fully equipped kitchen with vaulted ceiling and a staircase leading to an additional chill out area and a private office. From the living room there is access to a very sunny terrace, purpose built bbq and outdoor dining area with again more breathtaking views of the golf course. An internal staircase leads down to the master bedroom which had a private sun terrace, dressing room and double bathroom with a shower and bathtub. There are two additional guest bedrooms and a guest bathroom. The property also has a second lounge and living area with kitchen, bathroom and even a cocktail bar with direct access to the swimming pool and sunbathing deck. The property has been finished to a high quality and finished with many, many extras including private garage, air-conditioning, two fireplaces, mosquito nets, electric gates and alarm system.

Discover your dream home in this exquisite villa that offers the perfect blend of year-round living and idyllic extended holidays. Boasting breathtaking views of the Pink Lakes of Torrevieja and the sea, this property is nestled in the heart of nature with convenient access to essential services. The community features a generously sized communal pool, while the villa itself comes complete with a private swimming pool, providing the ideal setting for relaxation and entertainment. The living space is bathed in natural light, thanks to large windows that offer a captivating view of the pool. The open-plan kitchen, styled in a modern Scandinavian fashion, seamlessly connects to the lounge, creating a welcoming and contemporary atmosphere. On the ground floor, a spacious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom awaits, along with an additional bathroom for the convenience of guests. The property also provides direct access to the forth bedroom/living room from the inside, currently utilized as living room and cinema area. Venture to the first floor to discover two more generously sized bedrooms and another bathroom. Large terraces and a solarium contribute to the allure of this property, ensuring you can fully savor the vibrant Spanish lifestyle. Inside garage and utility room will come with the property. Situated in the charming area of Orihuela Costa, this home offers proximity to the renowned Pink Lakes of Torrevieja, providing a scenic backdrop for daily living. Torrevieja, a coastal town nearby, further enhances the appeal with its vibrant atmosphere, offering a myriad of amenities, cultural experiences, and pristine beaches. Secure your opportunity to experience the epitome of Mediterranean living - book your viewing now and step into a world of luxury and comfort. The house has a tourist license.

A exceptional detached villa, located in the highly sought-after and prestigious area of La Zenia, renowned for its proximity to local amenities, stunning beaches, and vibrant lifestyle. This impressive property is just a short stroll from the golden sands of La Zenia beach and the popular La Zenia Boulevard shopping centre, offering an unbeatable location for both convenience and leisure.
The villa is accessed through secure electric gates, which open onto a large private driveway with ample space for parking. Once inside, the property reveals an expansive and contemporary design, featuring 5 spacious bedrooms and 3 beautifully appointed bathrooms, offering plenty of room for both family living and entertaining.
The ground floor is dedicated to an open-plan living area that exudes a sense of space and light. The lounge, dining, and kitchen areas flow seamlessly, creating the perfect environment for modern living. Large patio doors open directly onto the covered terrace, providing an effortless connection between the indoor and outdoor living areas. The private pool, surrounded by well-maintained gardens, offers a peaceful oasis for relaxation, outdoor dining, and entertaining in style.
The villa is set on a generous plot of approximately 700m², providing an abundance of outdoor space, perfect for enjoying the Mediterranean climate. The beautifully landscaped gardens surround the property, creating a private and tranquil atmosphere. There is plenty of room for further outdoor enhancements, such as a barbecue area or additional seating areas.
This stunning home is presented in immaculate, "key-ready" condition, making it move-in ready without the need for any additional work. With modern fixtures and fittings throughout, this villa offers a blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, providing everything you need for a perfect family home or a luxurious holiday retreat.
Whether you're looking for a permanent residence or a holiday home, this villa offers exceptional value in one of the most desirable locations on the Costa Blanca. The combination of a prime location, spacious living areas, and high-end features makes this property a true gem.

An excellent opportunity to acquire a freehold, fully furnished, and recently renovated office space in the highly sought-after Playa Flamenca Commercial Center. Offering 72m² of bright, functional space, this ground-floor unit is completely move-in ready — ideal for any office-based business seeking a professional presence in a thriving commercial hub.
Key features of this prime property include a modern, fully fitted kitchen, a private toilet, and easy, convenient access for both employees and clients. The office is flooded with natural light, creating a welcoming, comfortable, and productive environment.
Perfectly positioned just minutes from the sea, this property enjoys a strategic location surrounded by supermarkets, restaurants, and essential amenities. The area also provides ample free parking, ensuring hassle-free visits for staff and clients alike.
If you’re seeking a turnkey, freehold office solution in a vibrant and high-demand location, this is a superb opportunity not to be missed. Contact us today for further details or to arrange a viewing!

Stunning South-Facing Villa in Cabo Roig just 500 meters from the stunning beach and marina, this spectacular 6-bedroom, 3-bathroom villa offers an unparalleled coastal lifestyle. With a spacious 1,345m² plot and an impressive 297m² build, this home is perfect for those seeking space, comfort, and Mediterranean charm.
Step into a bright and airy living area, complete with a built-in fireplace, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The villa boasts generously sized bedrooms, ensuring plenty of room for family and guests. Upstairs, you’ll find an independent apartment with its own bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom—ideal for visitors or as a private retreat.
Outside, the beautifully maintained garden surrounds a private swimming pool, offering the perfect place to relax and enjoy the Spanish sunshine. The villa is also conveniently located just minutes from shops, restaurants, and essential services, providing everything you need within easy reach.
Rarely do properties like this become available in such a highly sought-after location. Don’t miss your chance—contact us today to arrange a viewing!

desc.es:
Este impresionante apartamento de 3 dormitorios y 1 baño, recién renovado, está ubicado en una ubicación inmejorable, segunda línea de las famosas playas de Torrevieja, incluyendo la codiciada Playa del Acequión. Con un ambiente luminoso y acogedor, esta propiedad totalmente amueblada está lista para entrar a vivir, convirtiéndola en el hogar perfecto o una excelente oportunidad de inversión.
Diseñado con tecnología moderna y funciones de hogar inteligente, este apartamento ofrece el máximo confort. Aire acondicionado, calefacción por suelo radiante y sistema de agua controlados por WiFi, permitiéndote ajustar todo con solo un toque. Además, las persianas eléctricas también pueden controlarse a través de WiFi, brindando mayor comodidad y seguridad.
Ubicado en la cuarta planta, el balcón ofrece impresionantes vistas al mar, el lugar ideal para disfrutar del café por la mañana o relajarse al atardecer. Gracias a su orientación sureste, la propiedad recibe abundante luz natural durante todo el día, creando un ambiente cálido y acogedor.
Todo lo que necesitas está a tu alcance. Desde bancos, bares y excelentes restaurantes hasta panaderías, colegios, hospitales y el vibrante paseo marítimo de Torrevieja, este enclave privilegiado ofrece comodidad y calidad de vida.
Si buscas un apartamento moderno junto a la playa, con tecnología de última generación y vistas espectaculares, esta es la oportunidad ideal. ¡No dejes pasar esta oportunidad y contáctanos hoy mismo para más información o para concertar una visita!
desc.en:
This stunning newly renovated 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment is perfectly situated second line from the famous beaches of Torrevieja, including the sought-after Playa del Acequión. Offering a bright and welcoming atmosphere, this fully furnished property is move-in ready, making it the ideal home or investment opportunity.
Designed with modern technology and smart home features, this apartment offers the ultimate convenience. WiFi-controlled air conditioning, underfloor heating, and water system provide year-round comfort at the touch of a button. Additionally, the electronic shutters can also be controlled via WiFi, adding extra ease and security.
Located on the fourth floor, the balcony boasts breathtaking sea views, creating the perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee or unwind in the evening. With its southeast-facing orientation, the property is bathed in natural light throughout the day, enhancing the warm and inviting ambiance.
Everything you need is right on your doorstep! From bustling bars and top-rated restaurants to bakeries, schools, hospitals, and the vibrant seafront promenade of Torrevieja, this prime location offers both comfort and convenience.
If you're looking for a stylish, modern apartment by the beach with high-end technology and incredible views, this is the perfect choice. Don't miss out—contact us today for more details or to arrange a viewing!

This impressive 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom beachside villa sits on a generous 600 m² plot in the sought-after area of Orihuela Costa. Offering 220 m² of beautifully designed living space across three levels, this home delivers the perfect blend of style, comfort, and convenience.
Just minutes from the golden sandy beaches, it enjoys a prime location with easy access to local shops, restaurants, and essential amenities — making it ideal as a permanent residence, holiday home, or rental investment.
The main floor welcomes you with a bright and airy open-plan living and dining area, seamlessly connected to a modern, fully equipped kitchen. Large windows flood the space with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. This level also includes two well-proportioned bedrooms and a stylish bathroom.
Upstairs, the master suite is a standout feature with stunning sea views, a private terrace, and an elegant en-suite bathroom. Another spacious double bedroom also benefits from its own private terrace — perfect for morning coffee or evening drinks.
On the lower level, a self-contained apartment provides total privacy, complete with its own bedroom, bathroom, and lounge area — perfect for guests, extended family, or as a rental opportunity.
The outdoor space is equally impressive, with lush gardens, multiple terraces, and a private swimming pool offering a refreshing retreat throughout the summer. Ideal for outdoor dining, entertaining, or simply relaxing in the sun.
A rare opportunity in Orihuela Costa combining unbeatable beachside location, spacious interiors, and luxurious outdoor living. Don’t miss out.

An exclusive, fully renovated apartment on the frontline in the heart of Torrevieja with stunning sea views. The apartment features three spacious bedrooms, two modern bathrooms, high ceilings, wooden floors, and high-quality double-glazed windows, creating a cozy and elegant atmosphere. Its southwest orientation ensures excellent natural light throughout the day. The fully equipped kitchen is ready for immediate use, while the central air conditioning system with heating and cooling modes guarantees comfort all year round. Built-in wardrobes provide optimal storage, and the building has an elevator for added convenience. For security, an alarm system is installed. The apartment also includes an independent laundry room, as well as all necessary furniture and a TV. All utilities, including water and electrical wiring, are brand new and in perfect condition. The location is ideal for both living and investment, with bars, restaurants, supermarkets, schools, hospitals, and universities just a short walk away. Nearby, you’ll also find parks, playgrounds, green areas, golf courses, and entertainment centers. Community fees are €68 per month. This is a perfect home for those looking to enjoy comfort, the sea, and a well-developed infrastructure in the very heart of Torrevieja.

This freehold, south-facing property, located just 500 meters from the sought-after La Zenia Beach, presents a fantastic and flexible investment opportunity. Offering a unique layout with two independent units, each measuring 72.9m², the property provides a total of 145.8m² of versatile, adaptable space.
Recently upgraded with brand-new electrical wiring throughout, it ensures modern safety, reliability, and energy efficiency. Thanks to its prime coastal location, excellent natural light, and adaptable configuration, this property is perfectly suited for a range of uses — whether as a personal residence, rental investment, or business premises.
Don’t miss the chance to secure this freehold property in one of the area’s most desirable beachside locations. Contact us today for more details or to arrange a viewing!

Luxury 3-Bedroom Penthouse in Los Dolses – Stunning Views, Gym & Prime Location This stunning resale 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom penthouse in Los Dolses, near La Zenia, offers the perfect combination of modern comfort and Mediterranean charm. Located in a prestigious gated complex, this penthouse boasts a private solarium, stunning views, and access to top-class facilities, including a communal gym and swimming pools.
Key Features: ✅ Spacious & Bright Interiors – Open-plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows, filling the home with natural light. ✅ 3 Double Bedrooms – Including a stylish master suite, all designed for relaxation. ✅ 2 Modern Bathrooms – Featuring high-end finishes and contemporary fittings. ✅ Fully Equipped Kitchen – Sleek and modern with high-quality appliances. ✅ Expansive Private Solarium – Breathtaking panoramic views, ideal for sunbathing, dining, or entertaining. ✅ Large Terrace – A perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee or an evening drink. ✅ Exclusive Amenities – Access to a communal gym, beautifully maintained gardens, and swimming pools. ✅ Underground Parking & Storage – Added security and convenience. ✅ Fully Furnished & Move-in Ready – Tastefully decorated and equipped for immediate enjoyment.
Prime Location: 🌴 Los Dolses & La Zenia Boulevard – Walking distance to top shopping, dining, and entertainment. 🏖️ Beaches Nearby – A short drive to La Zenia & Playa Flamenca’s stunning sandy beaches. ⛳ Golfers’ Paradise – Close to Villamartin, Las Ramblas, and Campoamor golf courses. 🚍 Excellent Transport Links – Easy access to Alicante & Murcia airports, public transport, and major roads.
With high rental potential, this penthouse is a perfect holiday home, permanent residence, or investment property in one of Costa Blanca’s most sought-after areas.
📞 Contact us today to arrange a viewing!

Discover this beautifully renovated 1-bedroom apartment in the sought-after of Torrevieja. Originally a 3-bedroom home, it has been transformed into a spacious and modern living space, perfect for those who appreciate comfort and breathtaking views.
The highlight of this apartment is its wraparound balcony, offering uninterrupted views of the Mediterranean Sea and the famous pink salt lakes of Torrevieja. Whether you're enjoying your morning coffee or an evening sunset, the scenery is simply spectacular.
Residents have access to a large communal pool, ideal for cooling off on warm Spanish days. The apartment is just a 500-meter walk from the stunning Playa de los Náufragos, known for its golden sands and crystal-clear waters.
Located in a prime position, you're just a 5-minute drive from the vibrant town of Torrevieja, filled with restaurants, bars, and entertainment. For those who love to explore on foot, Punta Prima is only a 10-minute walk away, offering more beaches, shopping, and dining options.
This is a rare opportunity to own a unique and stylish home in one of the most desirable locations in Torrevieja. Whether as a holiday retreat or a permanent residence, this apartment offers the perfect blend of relaxation, convenience, and Mediterranean charm.

desc.es:
Este impresionante apartamento de un dormitorio ha sido hermosamente renovado y se encuentra en la codiciada Villamartin Plaza, dentro de una comunidad cerrada segura con acceso en ascensor. Ubicado en el prestigioso complejo residencial Villagolf, ofrece a los residentes acceso a una fantástica piscina comunitaria, rodeada de exuberantes jardines paisajísticos.
Perfectamente situado a solo unos minutos a pie de la animada Villamartin Plaza, el apartamento está cerca de una excelente selección de restaurantes, bares y un supermercado. El internacionalmente reconocido campo de golf Villamartin se encuentra a solo tres minutos a pie, lo que lo convierte en una opción ideal tanto para los amantes del golf como para quienes buscan un estilo de vida mediterráneo animado pero relajado.
Renovado recientemente con un estándar impecable, la propiedad presenta mejoras de alta calidad en todos sus espacios. El elegante salón-comedor de concepto abierto se integra perfectamente con una cocina moderna totalmente equipada, creando un ambiente luminoso y acogedor. El amplio dormitorio doble cuenta con armarios empotrados, mientras que el elegante baño dispone de una lujosa ducha a ras de suelo. Una terraza acristalada amplía el espacio habitable, ofreciendo un área versátil para relajarse y desconectar. Además, un lavadero independiente añade mayor comodidad, albergando la lavadora y el termo de agua.
Totalmente amueblado y equipado con aire acondicionado, este excepcional apartamento está listo para entrar a vivir, siendo una opción perfecta como residencia vacacional o inversión para alquiler.
desc.en:
This stunning one-bedroom apartment has been beautifully renovated and is set in the highly desirable Villamartin Plaza, within a secure gated community with lift access. Located in the prestigious Villagolf residential complex, it offers residents access to a fantastic communal pool, surrounded by lush, landscaped gardens.
Perfectly positioned just minutes stroll from the vibrant Villamartin Plaza, the apartment is within easy reach of an excellent selection of restaurants, bars, and a supermarket. The internationally acclaimed Villamartin Golf Course is just a three-minute walk away, making it ideal for both golf enthusiasts and those seeking a lively yet relaxed Mediterranean lifestyle.
Recently renovated to an impeccable standard, the property showcases high-quality upgrades throughout. The stylish open-plan living and dining area seamlessly connects to a modern fitted kitchen, creating a bright and inviting space. The spacious double bedroom features built-in wardrobes, while the elegant bathroom boasts a luxurious walk-in shower. An enclosed terrace enhances the living space, offering a versatile area to relax and unwind. Additionally, a separate utility room provides extra convenience, housing the washing machine and water heater.
Fully furnished and equipped with air-conditioning, this exceptional apartment is completely move-in ready, making it an ideal holiday home or rental investment.

Thriving Freehold Restaurant for Sale in El Raso! A rare and exciting opportunity to acquire a well-established, family-run restaurant in the heart of El Raso. With a strong reputation built over 20 years, this renowned business has become a go to destination for both locals and visitors, offering an excellent dining experience and a loyal customer base.
The restaurant consists of four units seamlessly combined into one of a total of 320m2, providing a spacious and versatile layout with a generous capacity of 200 guests. The southeast-facing terrace is a standout feature, ensuring year-round sunshine, making it a perfect spot for alfresco dining and attracting guests looking to enjoy the warm climate.
The interior is thoughtfully designed, offering a welcoming and stylish dining space, a fully equipped bar, and a professionally fitted kitchen with everything needed to run a successful operation. The restaurant comes fully furnished, meaning the new owner can take over and start trading immediately.
Located in a prime position within a busy and growing area, this restaurant benefits from high visibility and easy accessibility, ensuring a steady flow of customers. Whether you are an experienced restaurateur looking to expand your portfolio or someone seeking an exciting business venture, this is a turnkey opportunity that is not to be missed.
Don't miss your chance to own a thriving restaurant in a highly sought-after location.

desc.es:
Este magnifico reformado piso ofrece un espacio luminoso y moderno en el corazón de Torrevieja, una conocida ciudad en la hermosa Costa Blanca. Con cuatro amplias habitaciones y tres baños, esta propiedad es perfecta para familias, turistas o aquellos que buscan invertir en una ubicación muy demandada.
La vivienda cuenta con un patio privado y un balcón, perfectos para relajarse. Su ubicación inmejorable significa que tiendas, bares y paradas de autobús están justo en la puerta de casa, lo que hace que la vida diaria sea muy cómoda. Para los amantes de la playa, la impresionante costa mediterránea está a solo diez minutos a pie.
Torrevieja es famosa por su clima soleado, su ambiente vibrante y sus hermosos alrededores. Esta propiedad combina comodidad, estilo y ubicación, lo que la convierte en una oportunidad fantástica para tener una vivienda en una de las zonas más deseadas de España.
desc.en:
This nearly reformed apartment offers a bright and modern living space in the heart of Torrevieja, a well-known town on the beautiful Costa Blanca. With four spacious bedrooms and three bathrooms, this property is perfect for families, holidaymakers, or those looking to invest in a sought-after location.
The flat features a private patio and a balcony, providing the perfect spots to relax.. Its unbeatable location means shops, bars, and bus stops are right at your doorstep, making daily life incredibly convenient. For beach lovers, the stunning Mediterranean coastline is just a short ten-minute walk away.
Torrevieja is famous for its sunny climate, vibrant atmosphere, and beautiful surroundings. This property combines comfort, style, and location, making it a fantastic opportunity to own a home in one of Spain’s most desirable areas.

desc.es:
Descubra esta espectacular villa independiente de 4 dormitorios situada en una parcela de 900 m² cerca del conocido Campo de Golf de Villamartín. Hermosamente renovada, combina el encanto tradicional con las comodidades modernas, lo que la hace ideal para familias, amantes del golf y de la naturaleza.
La propiedad está rodeada de un exuberante jardín con portón eléctrico, entrada privada, piscina, jacuzzi, zona de barbacoa y una pérgola sombreada. En el interior, el espacioso salón-comedor con chimenea de leña conecta con una cocina totalmente equipada y una terraza con barbacoa integrada, que ofrece impresionantes vistas al campo de golf. Además, su amplio solárium ofrece vistas panorámicas de 360°. Todos los dormitorios están equipados con aire acondicionado, y uno de ellos se utiliza actualmente como vestidor con acceso directo al jardín. El baño principal incluye un lavabo doble, bañera y área de aseo.
Con calefacción central, amplio espacio de almacenamiento y licencia turística, esta propiedad es una oportunidad única para disfrutar o invertir en Villamartín.
desc.en:
Discover this spectacular 4-bedroom independent villa situated on a 900 m² plot near the well known Villamartín Golf Course. Beautifully renovated, it combines traditional charm with modern comforts, making it ideal for families, golf enthusiasts, and nature lovers.
The property is surrounded by a lush garden with an electric gate, drive way, pool, jacuzzi, barbecue area, and a shaded pergola. Inside, the spacious living-dining room with a wood-burning fireplace connects to a fully equipped kitchen and a terrace with a built in barbecue, offering stunning golf course views. Along with its spacious solarium provides 360° panoramic views. All 4 bedrooms are installed with air conditioning, one bedroom currently used as a dressing room with direct garden access. The main bathroom includes a double sink, bathtub, and toilet area.
With central heating, ample storage, and a tourist license, this property is a unique opportunity to enjoy or invest in Villamartín.

desc.es:
Ubicada en El Esparragal, Murcia, esta extraordinaria casa de campo ofrece una rara combinación de encanto rústico, comodidad moderna y un amplio espacio exterior. Perfecta para los amantes de la naturaleza y aquellos que buscan un retiro privado, esta propiedad es una joya oculta rodeada de belleza natural.
La finca se encuentra en una extensa parcela de 5,130 m² con una superficie habitable de 1,000 m², lo que proporciona un espacio amplio para relajarse, entretenerse y disfrutar de infinitas posibilidades. El área exterior incluye una piscina privada de 12x6, un porche de 100 m² y un jardín bellamente cuidado de 4,000 m², ideal para disfrutar de la serenidad del entorno. Otras características exteriores incluyen una zona de barbacoa, una terraza y un carport con espacio de aparcamiento para hasta 16 vehículos.
En el interior, la propiedad está cuidadosamente diseñada, combinando la auténtica artesanía española con comodidades modernas. La finca incluye una distribución espaciosa con todas las comodidades esenciales, como aire acondicionado, calefacción, conexiones de TV y teléfono, y electrodomésticos. También está amueblada, lo que la hace lista para mudarse. Un lavadero, trastero y electricidad proporcionan comodidad adicional para la vida diaria.
La orientación hacia el este de la finca permite que la luz natural inunde la casa, creando un ambiente cálido y acogedor. Ubicada a solo 10 minutos en coche de escuelas, tiendas y otros servicios locales, esta propiedad ofrece el equilibrio perfecto entre privacidad y comodidad. El aeropuerto más cercano está a solo 40 km, lo que garantiza fácil acceso para viajar.
Con una calificación energética en proceso, esta excepcional finca presenta una oportunidad única para quienes buscan abrazar un estilo de vida tranquilo en el campo sin renunciar a las comodidades modernas. Ya sea relajándose junto a la piscina, organizando reuniones en la terraza o simplemente disfrutando de la paz del entorno, esta propiedad es un verdadero refugio y una impresionante pieza del patrimonio de Murcia.
desc.en:
Set in the scenic countryside of El Esparragal, Murcia, this extraordinary country house offers a rare blend of rustic charm, modern comfort, and vast outdoor space. Perfect for nature lovers and those seeking a private retreat, this property is a hidden gem surrounded by natural beauty.
The finca sits on an expansive 5,130 m² plot with a 1,000 m² living space, providing ample room for relaxation, entertainment, and endless possibilities. The outdoor area includes a 12x6 private pool, a 100 m² porch, and a beautifully maintained 4,000 m² garden, ideal for enjoying the serene surroundings. Additional outdoor features include a BBQ area, a terrace, and a carport with parking for up to 16 vehicles.
Inside, the property is thoughtfully designed, blending authentic Spanish craftsmanship with modern amenities. The finca includes a spacious layout with all essential comforts such as air conditioning, heating, TV and telephone connections, and white goods. It is also furnished, making it ready to move in. A laundry room, storage room, and electricity provide added convenience for everyday living.
The finca’s east-facing orientation allows for natural light to fill the home, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Located just a 10-minute drive from schools, shops, and other local amenities, this property provides the perfect balance between seclusion and convenience. The nearest airport is just 40km away, ensuring easy access for travel.
With an energy rating in process, this exceptional finca presents a unique opportunity for anyone looking to embrace a tranquil countryside lifestyle without sacrificing modern comforts. Whether you're relaxing by the pool, hosting gatherings on the terrace, or simply enjoying the peaceful surroundings, this property is a true haven and a stunning piece of Murcia’s heritage.

desc.es:
Ubicada en las tranquilas afueras de Fortuna, esta impresionante villa de 4 dormitorios y 3 baños combina a la perfección la comodidad moderna con la elegancia mediterránea. Situada en una amplia parcela ajardinada, es una elección ideal para quienes buscan lujo, privacidad y fácil acceso a los principales puntos de interés de la zona.
La propiedad cuenta con jardines cuidadosamente mantenidos, adornados con palmeras y olivos, además de un amplio espacio de aparcamiento y dos grandes garajes, ideales para almacenamiento o caravanas. Los espacios exteriores incluyen una piscina privada con varias zonas de descanso, un jacuzzi para 5 personas y una cocina exterior completamente equipada, perfecta para reuniones y eventos al aire libre.
En el interior, la villa ofrece un salón luminoso equipado con aire acondicionado, una estufa de pellets y calefacción central de gas. La cocina de concepto abierto, equipada con electrodomésticos modernos, se conecta con un acogedor comedor y un lavadero que da acceso al jardín trasero. La suite principal ofrece un refugio espacioso con armarios empotrados y un baño privado que incluye una bañera de hidromasaje. Los dormitorios adicionales incluyen una habitación de invitados junto a un baño con ducha y una amplia suite en la planta superior con su propia sala de estar y espacio de oficina. El sótano, actualmente utilizado como gimnasio y sala de juegos, puede transformarse fácilmente en un dormitorio adicional o área para invitados.
La villa se encuentra a pocos minutos del pueblo de Fortuna, que ofrece tiendas, bares tradicionales españoles y mercados semanales, y a solo 4 minutos de los famosos baños termales de Fortuna. Para los amantes de las motocicletas, el circuito de motos de Fortuna está a solo 2 minutos, ofreciendo una emocionante oportunidad para disfrutar del mundo del motor. La ciudad de Murcia, con su encanto histórico y su vibrante oferta gastronómica, se encuentra a 20 minutos en coche, mientras que las impresionantes playas de la Costa Blanca están a menos de una hora.
Esta villa de 4 dormitorios y 3 baños no es solo un hogar, es una puerta de entrada a un estilo de vida relajado y enriquecedor, que ofrece tranquilidad, lujo moderno y una ubicación privilegiada cerca de lo mejor de Murcia. Se recomienda una visita para apreciar plenamente esta excepcional propiedad.
desc.en:
Located on the peaceful outskirts of Fortuna, this stunning 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villa seamlessly combines modern comfort with Mediterranean elegance. Set on a spacious, landscaped plot, it’s a perfect choice for those seeking luxury, privacy, and accessibility to local highlights.
The property boasts beautifully maintained gardens adorned with palm and olive trees, along with ample parking and two oversized garages ideal for storage or caravans. The outdoor spaces include a private pool with multiple seating areas, a 5-person Jacuzzi, and a fully equipped outdoor kitchen, perfect for entertaining.
Inside, the villa features a bright living room with air conditioning, a pellet stove, and gas central heating. The open-plan kitchen is fitted with modern appliances and flows into a cozy dining area, with a utility room leading to the back garden. The master suite offers a spacious retreat with fitted wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom featuring a Jacuzzi bath. Additional bedrooms include a guest room next to a walk-in shower bathroom and a spacious upstairs suite with its own lounge and office area. The versatile basement, currently a gym and games room, could be transformed into an additional bedroom or guest space.
The villa is just minutes from Fortuna village, offering shops, traditional Spanish bars, and weekly markets, and only 4 minutes from the renowned Baños de Fortuna thermal spas. For motorcycle enthusiasts, the Fortuna Moto Circuit is just 2 minutes away, providing an exciting opportunity to enjoy the thrill of motorsports. Murcia city, with its historic charm and vibrant dining scene, is a 20-minute drive, while Costa Blanca’s stunning beaches are under an hour away.
This 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom villa isn’t just a home—it’s a gateway to a relaxed and enriching lifestyle, offering tranquility, modern luxury, and proximity to the best of Murcia. Viewing is highly recommended to truly appreciate this exceptional property.

desc.es:
Esta singular casa de campo, situada en una parcela de 5,000 m², ofrece un refugio tranquilo con impresionantes vistas y comodidades excepcionales. Con una generosa construcción de 368 m², la propiedad es perfecta para quienes buscan un hogar espacioso con comodidades modernas en un entorno rural y apacible.
La casa principal cuenta con una luminosa y espaciosa cocina de estilo americano que se conecta perfectamente con las áreas de estar y comedor, creando el espacio ideal para recibir invitados. Con cuatro dormitorios y dos baños, incluyendo un lujoso baño en suite en el dormitorio principal y un vestidor, la vivienda está diseñada pensando en la comodidad y funcionalidad para toda la familia. Orientada al sur, la propiedad recibe abundante luz natural durante todo el día, mientras que la acogedora chimenea de leña y el aire acondicionado garantizan el confort durante todo el año.
El exterior es perfecto para disfrutar de la vida al aire libre, con una piscina de 5x10 metros, una atractiva zona de barbacoa y una cocina exterior cubierta. La propiedad está equipada con paneles solares, lo que la hace eficiente energéticamente, y también cuenta con conexiones de gas y electricidad. Un trastero ofrece amplio espacio para herramientas y equipos.
El anexo añade aún más versatilidad, con dos dormitorios adicionales y un baño, ideal para huéspedes, familiares o incluso como oportunidad de alquiler.
Ubicada a solo 15 minutos en coche del Aeropuerto de Murcia y con vistas al exclusivo La Torre Golf Resort, que está a solo cinco minutos, esta propiedad combina lo mejor de la vida en el campo con un acceso conveniente a servicios locales. Los alrededores tranquilos crean una atmósfera apacible y relajante, perfecta para escapar del bullicio de la vida urbana.
Esta excepcional casa de campo es una verdadera joya que ofrece confort, espacio y tranquilidad en una ubicación privilegiada. No pierda la oportunidad de convertir esta casa de ensueño en su hogar.
desc.en:
This unique country house, set on an expansive 5,000 m² plot, offers a tranquil retreat with breathtaking views and exceptional amenities. Boasting a generous 368 m² build, the property is perfect for those seeking a spacious home with modern comforts in a peaceful rural setting.
The main house features a bright and airy American-style kitchen that seamlessly connects to the living and dining areas, creating the perfect space for entertaining. With four bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a luxurious en-suite in the master bedroom and dressing area, the home is thoughtfully designed to cater to family living. Facing south, the property is bathed in natural light throughout the day, while the cozy wood burner and air conditioning ensure comfort year-round.
Outdoor living is at its finest with a 5x10 meter pool, an inviting BBQ area, a covered outdoor kitchen. The property is equipped with solar panels, making it energy-efficient, and also has both gas and electric connections. A storage room provides ample space for tools and equipment.
The annex adds even more versatility, offering two additional bedrooms and one bathroom, ideal for guests, extended family, or even as a rental opportunity.
Located just a 15-minute drive from Murcia Airport and overlooking La Torre Golf Resort, which is only five minutes away, this property combines the best of country living with convenient access to local amenities. The serene surroundings create a calm and relaxing atmosphere, making it a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.
This exceptional country house is a rare find, offering comfort, space, and tranquility in a prime location. Don't miss the opportunity to make this dream home your own.

Welcome to Villa Laguna a spectacular 4 bedroom detached exclusive villa, located on the outskirts of the La Manga Club, a luxurious golf resort boasting three 18 hole golf courses, hotel and all the amenties you would expect from a first class resort.
This impressive villa is built on huge plot, spanning over 13,000m2 accessed via a private driveway and two electric gates. Inside you will find the immaculate landscaped gardens with two beautiful ponds, waterfalls and a pretty streams along with a vineyard and various fruit trees along with a basketball and padel court and children's park.
The villa itself ticks every single box you could wish for with elevator access from the 300m2 garage which has its own private bar and two private rooms which could be converted into extra living accommodation. Upstairs in the main house you will find the main living room, 2 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, the office along with the fantastic kitchen with independent utility room and walk-in pantry. The is also access to the wraparound terrace and swimming pool, sun deck and bbq area with the most stunning views across the gardens.
On the top floor of the property there are 2 en-suite bedrooms fitted with walk-in closets and en-suite bathrooms. Both have private access to the solarium with views out towards the sea.
Built in 2006 this property has been built to a very high specification with many, many extras included and bespoke finishes.
Perfectly situated, the villa is just a short 10 minute drive to Cabo De Palos with its designated Integral Marine Reserve, considered to be one of the best scuba diving sites in the Region. The villa is also just 25km from the airport.

Luxury modern villa of new construction, located near the center of Pilar de la Horadada.. The villa is built on 2 floors, has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a studio kitchen with a living room, built-in wardrobes, a private garden with a swimming pool and a parking space off the road. The living room has direct access to the terrace and pool. The villa is equipped with pre-installation of a ducted air conditioner, LED lighting,plastic windows with double glazing, a hot water supply system using aerothermal energy and a private swimming pool. Nearby you will find supermarkets, restaurants, shops and pharmacies.

desc.es: Presentamos este edificio con encanto en Orihuela ciudad. Compuesto por un local comercial y dos plantas con dos amplios apartamentos y una casa añadida. Esta es una gran oportunidad de inversión para convertirlo en un hotel o apartamentos de alquiler. Es un edificio construido hace aproximadamente 120 años lo que lo convierte en un lugar histórico de la ciudad. Podemos encontrar elementos de diseño antiguo de esa época como techos altos, puertas y ventanas grandes, y mirillas con un sistema antiguo muy particular en las puertas de entrada de los apartamentos. Hay papel pintado de esa época en algunas de las paredes y un piano que es posible conservarlo para decoración del nuevo negocio. Este edificio necesita una renovación completa y es posible hacer más apartamentos en su interior o habitaciones para un hotel. En el local comercial hay un buen espacio para hacer un restaurante o tienda. La entrada del edificio está separada del local comercial, por lo que es un buen espacio para convertirlo en la recepción. También hay un garaje para varios coches y un patio interior que brindan luz natural a la parte interna de los apartamentos. Ubicado en un buen vecindario, este edificio tiene vistas al parque proporcionando un área tranquila y vistas a la montaña en la parte trasera. A poca distancia andando se puede llegar al centro comercial Ociopía y al centro deportivo. No pierdas esta buena oportunidad.
desc.en: We present this building with charm in Orihuela city. Composed of a local business and two floors with two huge apartments and a house added. This is a great opportunity of investment converting it into a hotel or rental apartments. Is a building built 120 years ago approximately which makes it in a historical place of the city. We can find old design elements of that age like high ceilings, high doors and big windows, and peepholes with a very particular old system in the front doors of the apartments. There are wallpaper of that age in some of the walls and a piano that is possible to keep it for decoration for the new business. This building need a complete renovation and is possible to make more apartments inside or rooms for a hotel. In the local business there are a good space to make a restaurants or shop. The entrance of the building is separated from commercial local so is good space to convert in the reception. Also there is a garage for several cars and a indoor patio that provide sunlight to the internal face of the apartments. Located in a good neighbourhood, this building has park views providing a quite area, and mountain views in the back side. Walking distance to Ociopía shopping center and the sport center. Don´t miss this good opportunity.

Property Highlights:
Prime Location: Situated mere moments from the sea, enjoy daily strolls along the beach and soak in breathtaking sunsets. Spacious Living: Three generously sized bedrooms provide ample space for relaxation and comfort, ideal for families or hosting guests. Convenient Access: Located on the first floor of a house with a lift, ensuring easy access and added convenience for all residents. Luxury Amenities: Dive into the sparkling private pool, practice your swings at the nearby padel and minigolf facilities, or enjoy a leisurely game of petanka. Underground Garage: Secure your vehicle in the dedicated underground garage, offering convenience and peace of mind. Elegant Interiors: Step inside to discover tastefully designed interiors adorned with high-quality materials, creating an ambiance of refined sophistication. Community Features:
Secure Gated Access: Enjoy the tranquility of a private, gated community with 24/7 security. Close to Entertainment: Relish in the proximity to a variety of dining and entertainment options, ensuring endless fun and convenience. This stunning first-floor apartment is the epitome of coastal elegance and modern living. Don't miss your chance to own a slice of paradise in this sought-after seaside community. Schedule a viewing today and experience the allure of your future home!

BEAUTIFUL refurbished townhouse in a lovely urbanization just outside San Miguel de salinas. As you enter the property you are welcomed with a large front garden terrace area with plenty of sun. As we enter the house there is a spacious living room and dining area then a great size modern kitchen. There is a downstair bathroom with shower completed , then a downstair bedroom which leads out to the back padio. As we go upstairs we are welcomed with a great size bedroom with ensuite and its balcony. Third bedroom and bathroom , this property offers so much space , tranquility and luxury finish. The property also has its own underground parking space and a huge storage room included in the price. There is a lovely communal pool to relax and just minutes drive away from the lovely golf courses such as las colinas , Villamartin. Dont miss out

BUY THIS RESALE DIRECT from the owner this brand new Penthouse apartment located just a 3 minute walk from the heart of San Pedro del Pinatar and a few minutes drive from both the Mediterranean sea and the Mar Menor. The top floor apartment boasts views across the stunning swimming pool on a private corner plot. The apartment has a very large living and dining room with floor to ceiling patio doors providing lots of natural light and access to the private terrace area. There is a spectacular fully fitted kitchen with feature 'island' and brand new kitchen appliances. The master bedroom has a stylish en-suite bathroom and there are an additional two guest bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a slick family bathroom with walk-in shower. The apartment also has a terrace to the rear of the property with an external staircase leading up to super impressive 77m2 solarium. This fantastic space boasts panoramic views across the swimming pool and has a equipped summer kitchen. You will also find the uitily room and storage cupboard. This property is sold with designated parking and a storage unit.

The Adelfa Community, located in the heart of Las Colinas Golf & Country Club, is a unique retreat in which to enjoy the natural beauty and climate of southeast Spain.
This villa has 130 m2 of constructed area. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and a terrace with garden and private swimming pool.
The villa combines contemporary architecture with high quality finishes to offer luminous spaces. Thanks to its spaciousness, there is a constant communication between the interior and the exterior, allowing you to enjoy breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea.

The exclusive frontline golf villas of the Ciruelo Community are located in a privileged location on Las Colinas Golf & Country Club golf course. The Ciruelo Community is made up of different villas, with a carefully studied location to optimise their orientation and views, as well as to ensure the enjoyment of the Mediterranean sun and light.
This community has been developed following the Bisbita villa model, which has a large plot of 976 m² with 200 m² of constructed area and a private swimming pool of 40 m². It includes three bedrooms, two bathrooms —an en suite and a guest toilet—, a fully equipped open plan kitchen and a closed garage with two parking spaces.
Its one-floor distribution and its large windows maximise its integration into the environment and facilitate outdoor living. Conceived for the enjoyment of the Mediterranean climate and landscape, this exclusive villa is very unique within the residential complex, both for its avant-garde design and its high-quality standards.
The project is the work of the architectural studio Abeman Arquitectos.

This impressive apartment features three spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, along with the potential for a fourth bedroom (currently a billiard room) measuring 25 square meters. It also boasts two full modern bathrooms. The expansive 50-square-meter living-dining area is filled with natural light and integrates an open kitchen equipped with modern appliances. The billiard room opens nicely up onto a huge summer terrace totalling 60 square metres, complete with an integrated gas stove, which include flower beds with automatic irrigation and a handy storage room. The terrace then wraps round and links back into the living area. A parking space in a communal garage is also included.
This apartment is very unique and must be viewed in person to fully appreciate.
The community offers fantastic amenities, featuring two large swimming pools—one equipped with exercise equipment, as well as a heated pool, 2 jacuzzis and a sauna. Both pool areas include children's pools, and one even has a playground. Located just five minutes from golf courses, shopping centers, and the stunning beaches of Orihuela Costa. (Comes partly furnished; an inventory will be provided for the buyer.)

Fully reformed 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom villa on a huge 800m plot in Torreta Florida, Torrevieja just an easy 15 minute walk into the heart of Torrevieja with access to the beaches and a huge array of bars, shops and restaurants along the way. Built in 1989 this villa has been reformed to a very high standard and finished with many extras including air-conditioning, private swimming pool, double garage and purpose built bbq area. The villa has 4 double bedrooms, a huge living and dining room and fully equipped kitchen. The villa is located in a priviledged area within a few minutes from Habaneras shopping mall, the cinema and waterpark.

Discover your dream home in this exquisite villa that offers the perfect blend of year-round living and idyllic extended holidays. Boasting breathtaking views of the Pink Lakes of Torrevieja and the sea, this property is nestled in the heart of nature with convenient access to essential services. The community features a generously sized communal pool, while the villa itself comes complete with a private swimming pool, providing the ideal setting for relaxation and entertainment. The living space is bathed in natural light, thanks to large windows that offer a captivating view of the pool. The open-plan kitchen, styled in a modern Scandinavian fashion, seamlessly connects to the lounge, creating a welcoming and contemporary atmosphere. On the ground floor, a spacious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom awaits, along with an additional bathroom for the convenience of guests. The property also provides direct access to the forth bedroom/living room from the inside, currently utilized as living room and cinema area. Venture to the first floor to discover two more generously sized bedrooms and another bathroom. Large terraces and a solarium contribute to the allure of this property, ensuring you can fully savor the vibrant Spanish lifestyle. Inside garage and utility room will come with the property. Situated in the charming area of Orihuela Costa, this home offers proximity to the renowned Pink Lakes of Torrevieja, providing a scenic backdrop for daily living. Torrevieja, a coastal town nearby, further enhances the appeal with its vibrant atmosphere, offering a myriad of amenities, cultural experiences, and pristine beaches. Secure your opportunity to experience the epitome of Mediterranean living - book your viewing now and step into a world of luxury and comfort. The house has a tourist license.

The living room has direct access to the terrace and pool. The villa is equipped with pre-installation of a ducted air conditioner, LED lighting,plastic windows with double glazing, a hot water supply system using aerothermal energy and a private swimming pool. The Enebro Community is situated in one of the most prestigious locations in the heart of Las Colinas Golf & Country Club.
Villa Abubilla faces the lush Mediterranean forest, passing through part of the golf course. The views invite you to connect with nature and to disconnect from the rest.
The distribution of this villa is divided into 3 floors. In the main room there is a huge kitchen with a central island in front of the swimming pool and terrace, letting in plenty of natural light. Next to them, there is a living room with a glass window facing a sea of trees with enviable and privileged views.
On the top floor is the master bedroom and bathroom, both rooms facing out into nature.
Upstairs on this floor there is a solarium with a Balinese hammock to enjoy the sun’s rays even closer.
The downstairs rooms are also immersed in the arboretum of Las Colinas Golf & Country Club.

Super modern 2nd floor apartment for sale on sought after Las Colinas Golf resort. This huge apartment has 2 very large bedrooms both with en-suite bathrooms along with a 3rd guest toilet. Their is a fully integrated and slick open-plan kitchen leading into the very wide living and dining room. There is a mega balcony with the most stunning sea views, golf course views and looks down over the manicured gardens and swimming pool. The property is sold as seen, with many extras including underground parking and storage and already has a rental license.

A completely NEW and KEY READY, modern and contemporary VILLA with 3 bedrooms, one on the ground floor and two on the first floor with a solarium of more than 30m2 of great privacy. There are 3 bathrooms, one private in the master-suite,also with a dressing room.
There is a private porch and garden of almost 90m2, as well as a comfortable terrace in the master suite that overlooks the pool.
Other qualities include: Fitted Kitchen with Appliances, Electric Blinds, Air Conditioning, Underfloor Heating in the Bathrooms, Semi-Basement, Private Pool with LED Lighting and Heat Pump.
Located in San Pedro del Pinatar, a perfectly privileged setting, just 5 minutes from the beaches of Mar Menor and Regional Park of the Salinas de San Pedro. Close also to the town centre, which has it´s own Medical centre, several supermarkets, school, police station and tourist centre.

A 264 square meter commercial space for sale in the very center of Torrevieja! This is the perfect offer to expand your business. Currently, there is a fabric store and a sewing workshop. The room is equipped with a spacious area of 200 square meters, 2 large storefronts, 2 bathrooms, a warehouse (which can be used as a kitchen), two air conditioners and a new electrical system. The facade of the building was also renovated this year.

This stunning and modern 5 bedroom, 4 bathrooms detached villa commands a fantastic position in the very popular area of La Zenia, just 100 metres from the beautiful blue flag beach. The area features a huge selection of amenities, including the very impressive Zenia Boulevard shopping centre, with over 150 shops and a selection of good restaurants. Recently built and completed in 2023, this very stylish villa offers spacious rooms throughout, with wonderful outdoor space to enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean climate. The ground floor comprises an entrance hallway, leading into to fabulous living room with a dining area and an open-plan fully fitted kitchen with an island. Large patio doors lead you to the terrace and pool area. This level also features a large double bedroom with ensuite bathroom, a double bedroom and a separate bathroom. An internal staircase leads you to the underbuild, featuring and a separate laundry room. Situated on the first floor is the sumptuous master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and ensuite, a second large double bedroom with ensuite, and a third guest double bedroom with ensuite. Each bedroom has direct access to the large wrap-around sun terrace. Internal stairs lead to the large roof terrace, perfect for relaxing day or night with views of the sea. The very attractive, low-maintenance garden benefits from the fabulous heated pool, a large terrace area, an outdoor kitchen with a seating area with a retractable awning, a storage room, and a private garage. Other features include Daikin brand air heater with fun-coil, with underfloor heating in all floors.

Commercial space of 932 m2 with access to the San Miguel de Salinas highway, currently divided into two commercial premises. it is located a few minutes from the center. Great business opportunities, with an entrance for vehicles, a large storefront overlooking a main avenue, ideal for a supermarket or any type of business. It has large open-plan spaces with a minimum ceiling height of 3.50 meters, office and toilets-changing rooms.

This house is simply magnificent! 468 square meters of comfort and coziness are located on the second floor. It is surrounded by a beautiful courtyard with a swimming pool and a barbecue area. Inside there are four bedrooms, four bathrooms, a stylish living room with a fireplace, a spacious kitchen with a pantry and a laundry room. Three bedrooms have their own bathrooms, and the main one has a fabulous wardrobe. On the upper floor there is an attic and two terraces overlooking the sea and the Torrevieja Salt Lake Park. On the ground floor you have an extensive commercial space covering a total area of 936 square meters and distributed between the main level and the basement. With a car entrance, a large storefront window overlooking the main avenue, this place is ideal for a supermarket or any other commercial enterprise. Inside you will find spacious outdoor areas with high ceilings of 3.50 meters, as well as office space and bathroom dressing rooms. Interestingly, both properties can be sold separately, providing a variety of investment opportunities. Within walking distance from the city center, with all amenities and shops, plus supermarkets, schools and a medical center, very well connected.

Fantastic opportunity to purchase a building plot located in a quiet neighbourhood, yet still in the heart of Benijofar village. The 200m West facing plot is located within a very short two minute walk to numerous local tapas bars and international restaurants. Benijofar is a very attractive Spanish village with many amenties including the beautiful church, town hall, medical centre, sports ground, schools and the Cañada Marsá park.
The plot has planning permission to build a property up to 460m2 across three levels with the possibility of including a semi-basement. There is also access to water, electricity and sewerage system along with natural gas.

Luxury modern villa with a large plot and private garden, including a swimming pool and private parking. It has 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, located on two floors, with a magnificent solarium, the total area of the house is 137 m2, the terrace area is 114m2, the plot area is 312m2 A gated Mediterranean complex with a large green area and three swimming pools, located in the elite part of Ciudad Quesada, Donna Peppa district, surrounded by new modern houses. The bungalow has its own yard and its own Parking. Nearby there are several supermarkets, 3 Schools, kindergartens, a Sunday market with the freshest farm products, bars and restaurants within walking distance!

PRIME LOCATION 50m from Playa del Cura, Torrevieja beach is this elevated ground floor apartment. This fabulous 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment has been reformed throughout with a brand new fully equipped kitchen along with 2 stylish bathrooms. The apartment has a huge living and dining room with access to a private glazed terrace with views down to the beach front. The property has two big bedrooms both with fitted wardrobes. The property has been tastefully reformed with modern floor tiling and is sold fully furnished and finished with air-conditioning. The property forms part of a very well maintained private complex where home owners have access to the communal showers and changing rooms to make it easy to wash-off the sand from the beach.

Fantastic unit for sale or rent-to-buy in a very sought-after location in Quesada. Directly visible and facing the main road, with plenty of parking. Previously, rented by Subway and a Butchers Shop, this unit has huge potential given the amount of traffic passing by and the surrounding area. Currently rented to a hair salon so this commercial is for someone who wants a steady future income.
The unit comes with 2 toilets, air-conditioning, back storage or kitchen with option to install extraction. There is also a terrace space as part of the property and potential to increase seating across the road. Walk-in fridge included in the price or can be removed.
Other commercial properties in this centre include: restaurants, cafeterias, lawyers, estate agent, vet, hardware store, insurance company, pharmacy, betting shop. There are 2 supermarkets directly behind and 2 huge superstores.

desc.es: Te presentamos este encantador restaurante ubicado en Benijofar. En este local de negocios puedes encontrar un restaurante activo y muy concurrido. Hay una terraza con mesas y sillas, y dentro hay buen espacio para más clientes. Hay 2 baños y una cocina grande. La cocina está completamente equipada y el restaurante está totalmente equipado con todo lo necesario para mantener el negocio. El negocio viene con una propiedad incluida que está arriba. Está muy bien situado en el centro del pueblo. Si desea hacer una visita, póngase en contacto con nosotros.
desc.en: We present this lovely restaurant located in Benijofar. In this business local you can find a active restaurant and very busy. There is a terrace with tables and chairs, and inside there is good space for more clients. There are 2 toilets, and a big kitchen. The kitchen is completely equipped and restaurant is fully equipped with everything you need to keep the business. The business comes with a property included that is above. Is very well located in the center of the town. If you would like to do a viewing, contact us.

desc.es: Presentamos esta bonita y renovada casa adosada ubicada en Benijófar. Esta propiedad cuenta con un local comercial en la planta baja. En la entrada hay escaleras que van a la propiedad. En el interior podemos encontrar primero un salón de buen tamaño, tres dormitorios (uno de ellos con terraza), un baño, una cocina completamente equipada con acceso a un patio. Desde el patio hay escaleras que conectan con el restaurante. También puede encontrar un gran solárium con trastero. Desde el solárium hay hermosas vistas a la montaña. Esta casa es una gran oportunidad para vivir en un pueblo tranquilo y tener un negocio que puedes alquilar.
desc.en: We present this lovely and renovated townhouse located in Benijófar. This property comes with a local business in the ground floor. In the entrance there are stairs that goes to the property. Inside we can find first a good size living room, three bedrooms (one of them with terrace), one bathroom, a completed equipped kitchen with access to a patio. From the patio there are stairs that connect to the restaurant. Also you can find a big solarium with with storage room. From the solarium there are beautiful mountain views This house is a big opportunity to live in a quite town and to have a business that you can rent.

desc.es: Te presentamos una buena oportunidad de tener tu propia vivienda en el centro de Los Montesinos. Esta villa puede ser totalmente renovada o la parcela puede usarse para construir una nueva casa. En la entrada encontramos un gran salón, y también hay un trastero. Hay tres dormitorios y un baño. Encontramos un salón comedor, una cocina independiente con acceso a un gran patio donde se puede construir una piscina. Esta villa da a dos calles, por lo que en el otro lado hay un acceso para coches. Situado en el centro del pueblo, tienes a poca distancia tiendas, bares y todo lo que necesitas.
desc.en: We present a good opportunity to have your own home in the center of Los Montesinos. This villa can be totally renovated or the plot can be used to build a new house. In the entrance we find a big living area, and also there is a storage room. There are three bedrooms and one bathroom. We find a dinning room, an independent kitchen with access to a huge patio where is possible to build a pool. This villa overlooks two streets, so there is in the other side a car access. Located in the center of the town, you have walking distance shops, bars and everything you need.

The Enebro Community is situated in one of the most prestigious locations in the heart of Las Colinas Golf & Country Club.
Villa Abubilla faces the lush Mediterranean forest, passing through part of the golf course. The views invite you to connect with nature and to disconnect from the rest.
The distribution of this villa is divided into 3 floors. In the main room there is a huge kitchen with a central island in front of the swimming pool and terrace, letting in plenty of natural light. Next to them, there is a living room with a glass window facing a sea of trees with enviable and privileged views.
On the top floor is the master bedroom and bathroom, both rooms facing out into nature.
Upstairs on this floor there is a solarium with a Balinese hammock to enjoy the sun’s rays even closer.
The downstairs rooms are also immersed in the arboretum of Las Colinas Golf & Country Club.

We present this villa located in Villamartin. When we enter into this property we can find a huge living room with fireplace. This living room is connected to the dinning room. And from there we go to a open kitchen with laundry room. There is a long corridor where we find four of the bedrooms with wardrobes, and two bathrooms whichs one of them has bathtub. Upstairs we find the fifth bedroom and a big solarium with sea views. This property is perfectly located as it has many bars, shops and supermarkets walking distance. And also has Campoamor and Ramblas Golf courses only 10 minutes walking.

desc.es: Presentamos este edificio con encanto en Orihuela ciudad. Compuesto por un local comercial y dos plantas con dos amplios apartamentos y una casa añadida. Esta es una gran oportunidad de inversión para convertirlo en un hotel o apartamentos de alquiler. Es un edificio construido hace aproximadamente 120 años lo que lo convierte en un lugar histórico de la ciudad. Podemos encontrar elementos de diseño antiguo de esa época como techos altos, puertas y ventanas grandes, y mirillas con un sistema antiguo muy particular en las puertas de entrada de los apartamentos. Hay papel pintado de esa época en algunas de las paredes y un piano que es posible conservarlo para decoración del nuevo negocio. Este edificio necesita una renovación completa y es posible hacer más apartamentos en su interior o habitaciones para un hotel. En el local comercial hay un buen espacio para hacer un restaurante o tienda. La entrada del edificio está separada del local comercial, por lo que es un buen espacio para convertirlo en la recepción. También hay un garaje para varios coches y un patio interior que brindan luz natural a la parte interna de los apartamentos. Ubicado en un buen vecindario, este edificio tiene vistas al parque proporcionando un área tranquila y vistas a la montaña en la parte trasera. A poca distancia andando se puede llegar al centro comercial Ociopía y al centro deportivo. No pierdas esta buena oportunidad.
desc.en: We present this building with charm in Orihuela city. Composed of a local business and two floors with two huge apartments and a house added. This is a great opportunity of investment converting it into a hotel or rental apartments. Is a building built 120 years ago approximately which makes it in a historical place of the city. We can find old design elements of that age like high ceilings, high doors and big windows, and peepholes with a very particular old system in the front doors of the apartments. There are wallpaper of that age in some of the walls and a piano that is possible to keep it for decoration for the new business. This building need a complete renovation and is possible to make more apartments inside or rooms for a hotel. In the local business there are a good space to make a restaurants or shop. The entrance of the building is separated from commercial local so is good space to convert in the reception. Also there is a garage for several cars and a indoor patio that provide sunlight to the internal face of the apartments. Located in a good neighbourhood, this building has park views providing a quite area, and mountain views in the back side. Walking distance to Ociopía shopping center and the sport center. Don´t miss this good opportunity.
