Immaculate villa for sale located with elevated, front-line views located at Las Ramblas golf resort. This impressive south facing property was designed so that every room boasts spectacular views across the golf course and pine forrest. On the main level of the property is a huge living room with seperate television and dining areas along with a guest toilet. There is an impressive fully equipped kitchen with vaulted ceiling and a staircase leading to an additional chill out area and a private office. From the living room there is access to a very sunny terrace, purpose built bbq and outdoor dining area with again more breathtaking views of the golf course. An internal staircase leads down to the master bedroom which had a private sun terrace, dressing room and double bathroom with a shower and bathtub. There are two additional guest bedrooms and a guest bathroom. The property also has a second lounge and living area with kitchen, bathroom and even a cocktail bar with direct access to the swimming pool and sunbathing deck. The property has been finished to a high quality and finished with many, many extras including private garage, air-conditioning, two fireplaces, mosquito nets, electric gates and alarm system.

desc.es: Enorme y espectacular apartamento ubicado en el centro de Torrevieja. Compuesto por 5 dormitorios y 2 baños, este apartamento tiene un buen potencial. Puede encontrar alrededor de la propiedad muchas tiendas, bares y está a poca distancia andando de la playa. Hay un gran salón con chimenea y acceso a la terraza donde hay vistas urbanas y donde es posible ver el carnaval, las procesiones de Semana Santa y muchos eventos que transcurren en una de las calles más céntricas de la ciudad. En este apartamento podemos encontrar una gran cocina con un patio muy bonito con estilo andaluz. También hay una habitación para una despensa. Todos los dormitorios tienen armarios empotrados y el dormitorio principal tiene baño en suite.
desc.en: Huge and spectacular apartment located in Torrevieja center. Composed of 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, this apartment has a good potential. You can find around the property many shops, bars and is walking distance to the beach. There is a big living room with fireplace and access to the terrace where there are urban views and where is possible to view carnival, Holy Week processions and many events that pass through in one of the most central streets of the city. In this apartment we can find a big kitchen with a very nice patio with andalusian style. There is also a storage room. All the bedrooms have wardrobes and the master bedroom has en suite bathroom. This property has air conditioning.

This fabulous home is located in a prime location in Cabo Roig, just 400m from the beach. This stunning villa has been beautifully refurbished throughout to a high standard with underfloor heating in all 4 bathrooms, air conditioning in all rooms and ceramo granite flooring throughout. Set on a 518m2 plot the property consists of:
OUTSIDE High walls around the boundaries, with new non slip floor tiles, 8×6 infinity pool, space for parking 3 cars off road, shower, brick built storage room, room to make outdoor entertaining area on a 518m2 plot.
LOUNGE 6.51 X 5.81 m2 Wood burn fire and marble fire surround fire place, windows to the side, door to the cloakroom with low flush toilet and sink. To the rear of the property there are patio doors that leads out onto the outdoor dining area.
KITCHEN 1.91 X 5.90 m2 Fully fitted in cream shaker style units with ceramic hob, electric oven, fridge freezer, dish washer and washer all made by Bosch. Granite work tops and splash backs, electric boiler, window to the side and door to the rear side leading to the garden. Possible to make a garden kitchen.
BEDROOM ONE 2.44 X 4.33 m2 Window to the side, air conditioning installed. This room could be used as office or dining room. Has all pre-installed internet and communication cables.
BATHROOM 3.65 X 1.77 m2 Under floor heating, shower cubicle, sink, low flush toilet, bidet and window to the side. Tiled tastefully throughout in cream.
BEDROOM TWO 3.36 X 3.67 m2 Patio window to the front leading to front balcony and air conditioning.
FIRST FLOOR BEDROOM THREE 3.24 X 3.92 m2 with ENSUITE 3.65 X 1.87 m2 Patio door leading onto private balcony, air conditioning and door to en-suite. En-suite with under floor heating, tiled throughout, walk in shower, low flush toilet, bidet and glass sink unit.
BEDROOM FOUR 3.74 X 3.58 m2 with ENSUITE 3.60 X 1.92 m2 Patio door to the rear leading onto rear balcony of 20m2, air conditioning and door to en suite. En suite with under floor heating, walk in shower, low flush toilet, bedit and double his and hers vanity sink unit.
BEDROOM FIVE 3.87 X 3.90 m2 with EN SUITE 3.55 X 1.92 m2 Patio window to the front leading to the front private balcony, air conditioning and door to ensuite. Ensuite with bath and overhead shower, low flush toilet, bidet, vanity sink unit, under floor heating and tiled throughout. There is a window to the rear. All fixtures and fittings are brand new, never used and to the highest quality.
2ND FLOOR SOLARIUM With stone balustrade, floor tiles and sea views. Sunny and private. The property should be view to see the quality and finish. To arrange appointment please call us today

desc.es: La propiedad Finca Los Molinos se encuentra a solo 11 kilómetros de San Javier y el impresionante Mar Menor, y a 17 kilómetros de la ciudad de Murcia. Tiene preciosas vistas y se encuentra cerca de exclusivos campos de golf, y de las ciudades de Torrevieja, La Manga y Cartagena, entre otras. En la propiedad destaca el hermoso Molino y las diferentes parcelas disponibles y listas para construir. Esta compuesta de cuatro partes y es posible comprar algunas o todo el conjunto. Terreno de 19000 metros cuadrados en el acceso directo al terreno Los Molinos desde la carretera del Mar Menor en el que se encuentran las siguientes instalaciones: Molino construido en 1980 en muy buen estado que siempre ha sido emblema de la Región de Murcia, bar restaurante de madera con todas las instalaciones necesarias para su puesta en marcha, valla asfaltada que da sombra a un ficus centenario, centro de jardín con invernadero y zonas de aparcamiento asfaltadas y valladas.
desc.en: The Finca Los Molinos property is located just 11 kilometers from San Javier and the stunning Mar Menor, and 17 kilometers from the Murcia city. It has beautiful views and is located near exclusive golf courses, and the cities of Torrevieja, La Manga and Cartagena, among others. On the property stands out the beautiful Mill and the different plots available and ready to build. Is composed of 4 parts and is possible to buy some of them or all together. Land of 19000 square meters in the direct access of the land Los Molinos from the highway of Mar Menor in which there are following facilities: Mill built in 1980 in a very good condition which has always been an emblem of Region of Murcia, bar restaurant wooden with all the necessary facilities for its start-up, asphalt fence which gives shaed a centenary ficus, a garcen center whit a green house and asphalt and fenced parking areas.
desc.de: The Los Molinos plot is located just 11km from San Javier and the Mar Menor, and 17km from Murcia city. It has beautiful views and is located near exclusive golf courses, and cities like Torrevieja, La Manga and Cartagena. On the property stands out a beautiful mill and different plots ready to build. It is made up of four plots and have 19.000 square meters in total. There is direct access from the Mar Menor motorway. There is mill built in 1980, bar restaurant with picnic area, with everything ready to start. And also there is a garden center with greenhouse and parking area.

desc.en: Spectacular rustic style house fully equipped and ready to move into. The house consists of 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms with high quality finishes. State-of-the-art appliances are included. The kitchen stands out for having a solid stone countertop and sink that is resistant and gives it a unique style. It has a backyard with a built-in barbecue and a solarium with pre-installation for a Jacuzzi. In addition, the house has centralized air conditioning, a fireplace and solar panels to reduce electricity consumption. It has a private garage with room to install more. In it there there is a small room built and the possibility of installing a bathroom, as well as some more room is also possible. The location is also very good as it is located in a very quiet street without large buildings around it but at the same time it is within walking distance of the city center.

Established for over 35 years, this very well known bar and restaurant is located at the top of Ciudad Quesada with stunning views towards Guardamar, next to the municipal swimming pool. This thriving business is sold freehold and benefits from year round clientele from local residents and a heaving summer and tourist trade.
The commerical property consists of a fully equipped industrial kitchen, a sunny terrace area with outdoor bbq area, an indoor dining room and restaurant, and even a cellar, basement and storage area which is conveniently accessed from the bar. The large premises is fully licensed to seat 71 inside and up to 50 outside on the terrace.
An added perk is the free municipal pool located next door to the bar-restaurant attracting tourists all day long during the Summer months serving food and cold drinks.
Contact us today for more information about this key ready business opportunity.

desc.sv:
Fantastisk rymlig villa i gröna omgivningar med närhet till populära golfbanor. Läget är lugnt och privat och bjuder på fantastisk utsikt mot apelsinodlingar, saltsjön och medelhavet!
Vi når fastigheten via en gånggrind eller en bredare grind för att parkera bilen på tomten. På framsidan finns en mycket rymlig terrass med pool. Vi kommer in i huset och anländer i ett ljust, rymligt vardagsrum med matplats i öppen planlösning. Rakt framför oss hittar vi det separata välutrustade köket. På detta våningsplan finns dessutom två sovrum, två badrum och tvättstuga.
Vi går en trappa upp och hittar ytterligare 3-4 sovrum och 3 badrum. Det största sovrummet har jacuzzi, walk-in shower, toalett och balkong med fantastisk utsikt.
Ytterligare en trappa upp hittar vi takterrassen och ett rum.
desc.en:
Fantastic spacious villa in green surroundings with proximity to popular golf courses. The location is quiet, private and offers fantastic views of orange groves, the salt lake and the Mediterranean!
We reach the property via a pedestrians gate or a wider gate to park the car on the plot. At the front there is a very spacious terrace with pool. We enter the house and arrive in a bright, spacious living room with open plan dining area. Right in front of us we find the separate well-equipped kitchen. On this floor there are also two bedrooms, two bathrooms and laundry room.
We go upstairs and find another 3-4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The main bedroom has a jacuzzi, walk-in shower, toilet and balcony with stunning views.
Upstairs we find the roof terrace and another room.

We have the pleasure marketing this unique country house which is set facing the stunning fresh lake of La Pedera. The views from the living areas bedrooms and terraces are outstanding! The beautiful tranquil turquoise colours of the lake to the countryside surroundings are breathtaking. The array of citrus trees, wild flowers and herbs, olive and almond trees stretch across the plains of Terremendo. The property has beautiful stories about its development of what it is has become today. From the interesting antique furniture to the decorative solid wooden doors this property seeps in Directly next to la Pedrera reservoir, the property is surrounded by orange trees. Large open spaces, and warm and cosy rooms in which spend great moments at any time of the day with family or friends. The Oasis wakes up caressed by the sunshine with the visit of the partridges, rabbits, hermits and turtledoves who walk inside the fenced property. When the season comes, the orange blossom delights the senses. The Pedrera area is considered as a wet land protected area, that is why it will never be invaded by any kind of urbanistic projects. The strength and the colors of the sunsets are captivating and when the night comes you only have to let yourself be embraced by the scents and the gentle breeze. The large open spaces, and warm and cozy rooms enables you to spend great moments at any time of the day or evening with family or friends. The 14.5m x 7m private swimming pool is a fantastic assett and set in a stunning location of the house to capture the best of the daytime sunshine and evening sunsets and stars. The property is currently used as a successful business or simply used as a family home. The business could be corporate events company presentations, fabulous weddings,private celebrations or a even long/short term rental option. Natural spring water is fed to the property from the mountains via a well at the house. There is seating accommodation for up to 450 + 900 guest in two different areas. There is car parking, pool, terraced areas and large garden areas surrounding the property. The property consists of 320m2 of happiness where the notion of light, space and peace appear in their full dimensions. A different place to live a different moment…
To read more about this fabulous property please look at this website; http://www.theoasisproperty.com/the-property

Located in Los Altos, (Next Los Balcones). Property Model A built on a 280 m2 plot, with a total constructed area of 257 m2, distributed on 2 floors with 129 m2 built and a 128 m2 under build,garage included. It consists of 3 bedrooms plus self contained apartment in the underbuild 3 bathrooms, living room separate dining room, separate kitchen fully equipped,pre installation for A\C for 400000 euros.And Property Model B built on a 206 m2 plot, with a total constructed area of 225 m2, distributed on 2 floors with 101 m2 built and a 124 m2 under build,garage included. It consists of 2 bedrooms plus self contained apartment in the underbuild 3 bathrooms, living-dining room, separate kitchen fully equipped,pre installation for A\C for 355000 euros These properties are located in one of the privileged areas of the Costa Blanca South, more specifically in Los Altos, 3 minutes from Punta Prima Beach, Cala Ferry, close to all services restaurants, cafes, shops, shopping centers, schools, hospital, as well as access to the motorway.Distance to the Golf 6 km and to the Airport 36 km.Viewing is advisable for more information contact one of our friendly members of staff.

Located in Los Altos, (Next Los Balcones). Property built on a 140 m2 mid terrace plot, with a total constructed area of 162 m2, distributed on 2 floors with 102 m2 built and a 60 m2 underbuild garage included.There is access to a communal pool. It consists of 2 bedrooms plus 1 bedroom in the underbuild 3 bathrooms, living room separate dining room, Kitchen fully equipped,pre installation for A\C and central heating .These properties are located in one of the privileged areas of the Costa Blanca South, more specifically in Los Altos, 3 minutes from Punta Prima Beach, Cala Ferry, close to all services restaurants, cafes, shops, shopping centers, schools, hospital, as well as access to the motorway.Distance to the Golf 6 km and to the Airport 36 km.Viewing is advisable for more information contact one of our friendly members of staff.

The property itself is situated on a very quiet road, each property having adequate privacy. On approaching the property you notice it has both a pedestrian gate and double gates for vehicles. Once inside the grounds the first thing that stands out is the generously sized swimming pool. Further up the path you will reach the steps up to the porch and reinforced entrance door. You can access the back of the property from the outside as the pathway leads all around. There is a driveway where up to 5 cars can park and leads to the garage with electric door. Stepping inside the property you will be taken aback at the abundantly sized lounge/diner, with working log burning fireplace. This room is very light and airy but most of all spacious. The downstairs bathroom is just off the lounge and is fully tiled with a walk in shower as well as a bidet, w/c and sink. There is also a very large storage cupboard under the stairs. Onward from the lounge/diner, you walk into the kitchen area which is open plan to another great size reception room. The reception room is currently used as another dining area with plenty of space for the whole family and guests! In the kitchen you will find a large integrated fridge/freezer with electric oven and electric hobs, the kitchen also has an exterior door leading to another small terrace and the BBQ area. Through from the kitchen/reception room, you will come to the downstairs bedroom/office with plenty of space for either 2 x single beds or a double. This room is currently being used as an office, This room has the utility area just off from it, the utility area has the washing machine, boiler and plenty of storage space for cleaning appliances etc. Going upstairs on the marble staircase you get to the landing and a patio door to the front facing balcony, here you have incredible panoramic views of La Zenia this is also where you will find the sun in the mornings. Both bedroom ½ are of a good size built in wardrobes and plenty of storage, both bright and sunny. Bedroom 3 the master bedroom is a large room with en-suite bathroom which features his and her sinks, bidet and enormous bath with Jacuzzi jets. This room has a patio door leading to a private balcony where you will find the sun in the afternoon. The family bathroom is fully tiled with bath and additional shower installed.
La Zenia is such a sought after location, ideally placed for easy access to fine restaurants, bars with live entertainment, excellent golf courses for the avid golfer and golden beaches for the sun worshipper or swimmer.
For day trips out head north to the inland town of Elche famous for its palms or go south to the Mar Menor where the La Manga Club is located. The historic city of Murcia is not far and here there are a couple of good shopping malls. If you want history, nearby Rojales and Orihuela have old towns and cave houses.
Torrevieja is still very Spanish and has wonderful beaches and promenade just some of the interesting places to explore. Just 15 to 20 minutes to Murcia airport it is so easy for holiday makers to travel to. Or if you are living here full time not long to get to the airport to visit relatives in the UK or other European countries.

Fed up of the gloomy UK weather? Do you want to soak up the sun with a sea breeze and a cocktail? Do you want to make life long memories in your own holiday home? Do you want to relocate to the sun? Then look no further this property could be just what your looking for – This stunning detached villa is in the lovely area of Sucina. It contains 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 family bathrooms and one en-suite in the master bedroom. This property is huge as it has consists of 2 separate lounges, 2 kitchens and a dining area. This villa has a huge plot of 1200sqm plus a build size of 282sqm which has been maintained very well. On this amazing plot there are some lovely orange and lemon trees, a tiled undercover porch perfect for relaxing and also your very own private pool to cool off in the hot summer days. If you love entertaining guests then this property is perfect for you as it not only has an outdoor kitchen but also a BBQ to enjoy all throughout the year. The airport of San Javier is approx a 10 minute drive and the airport of  Alicante is approx a 60 minute drive. There are local beaches approx a 10 minute drive from this property and local amenities are within an easy reach.
